[\[42b.3\]]ngor phung po la sogs pa bstan te/_bdag zhal gyis bzhes pa yin no/_/gdul ba'i rjes su thub pa yi/_/gang zag zhal bzhes ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra skyob pas phung po dang /_/skye mched khams rnams rab tu bshad/_/de bzhin rnam rig bstan pa yang /_/dngos 'dzin thog ma yod min
[\[42b.4\]]pa/_/yun ring gnas pa spang dka' ba/_/rim gyis drang phyir mdzad pa yin/_/chos rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/_/rang bzhin med nyid bstan gang yin/_/de ni chos kyi gces pa yin/_/de ni dbang phyug seng ge'i sgra/_/zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag
[\[42b.5\]]go/_/slu ba mthong phyir ma brtags na/_/nyams dga' ba yi tshad ma yid/_/de yi gzhal bya rnam gzhag na/_/'jig rten spyod pa skyob par 'gyur/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i snang bas rtogs par bya ba'i tshad mas gzhal bya rnam par gzhag na/_tha snyad 'jal bas 'di la cis kyang
[\[42b.6\]]mi 'brel lo/_/lung gis bskyed pas 'dus byas pa'i/_/rtogs pas bskyed pa'i bdag nyid nyid/_/rnam par bsal nas snang rnams la/_/ngo bo spyod par byed pa yin/_/gzhan du gzhi rab ma grub phyir/_/'di ni gtan tshigs ma grub 'gyur/_/dmigs pa pa rnams 'gal ba yi/_/yon
[\[42b.7\]]tan grub par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba ni bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag go/_/thams cad bsdus phyir gnod pa yi/_/rkyen la brten pa'i khyab pa grub/_/de yi phyir na gtan tshigs la/_/'gal ba dang ni 'khrul pa med/_/rnam pa gzhan med pa yi phyir/_/gtan tshigs
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]dngos la khyab byed pa/_/rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pas/_/'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid du thal bar ga la 'gyur/_ma grub pa nyid ni rtag tu gsal ba kho na'o/_/de nyid phyir ni gzugs brnyan las/_/sogs pa'i dpe ni ma grub po/_/rtsa ba'i gtan tshigs
[\[43a.2\]]'di nyid kyis gzugs brnyan la sogs pa rang bzhin med pa nyid kyang grub pa yin no/_/'di ni byis pas go bya'i phyir/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis bshad/_/'di ni 'brel pa brjed pa dran pa nye bar bskyed pa'i phyir slob dpon klu sgrub la sogs pas bkod do/_/de lta ma yin na
[\[43a.3\]]cir yang mi dgos pa'i phyir te/_dpe la gtan tshigs dngos po dang /_/de dngos de mi shes la bstan/_/mkhas pa la ni gtan tshigs nyid/_/'ba' zhig brjod par bya ba yin/_/zhes gang bshad pa yin no/_/gnod pa'i rkyen phyir bsgrub bya yi/_/mi mthun phyogs las
[\[43a.4\]]gtan tshigs ldog_/de yi 'khrul pa nyid dang ni/_/'gal ba nyid dag gnas med do/_/yang dag gtan tshigs 'di yis ni/_/gnyi ga la brten dpe yang grub/_/dran smos mnyam par gzhag pa'i rgyur/_/snga ma rnams kyis bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i
[\[43a.5\]]tshigs su bcad pa dag go/_/gal te dngos su na bsgrub par bya ba las tha mi dad pa'i phyir gtan tshigs dam bcas pa'i phyogs gcig nyid yin no zhe na/_ma yin te/_rang bzhin med pa'i tha snyad du/_/rung ba nyid du sgrub par byed/_/gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin nyid/_/bral bas
[\[43a.6\]]rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/dngos por mngon par zhen pa la chos thams cad bdag med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba nyid du sgrub kyi chos thams cad bdag med pa kho na ni ma yin te/_gtan tshigs grub pa nyid kyis de grub pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar chos kun gzod ma nas/_/ma skyes zhes ni bya
[\[43a.7\]]bar gnas/_/nang dang phyi rol 'di dag ni/_/'khrul pa tsam zhig rab tu snang /_/de bas na dngos po thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa dang /_nang dang phyi rol gyi snang ba gang yin pa 'di dag thams cad ni 'khrul pa kho na'o zhes bya ba 'di gnas pa yin no/_/sna tshogs 'di ni
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]'khrul tsam na/_/ma 'khrul ci zhig yin pa smros/_/'khrul pa tsam zhig yod shes pa/_/ma 'khrul yin par nges par bzung /_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa'am/_/mtha' gnyis kyi ni rnam spangs pa/_/'di ni dbu ma'i lam yin par/_/seng ge'i nga ros
[\[43b.2\]]bstan pa yin/_/'gro ba sdug bsngal bskyab phyir thugs rjes gzhan gyi dbang gis sems can phan gdags la/_/phyogs pa'i bde gshegs rnams kyis tshad ma dang ldan shes rab de nyid 'di bstan pa/_/gang yin de la srid pa'i rgya mtsho nyon mongs chu bo stong 'khrug
[\[43b.3\]]mthar bgrod par/_/mngon sum dag tu bya phyir deng sang mkhas rnams sems mnyam gzhag par gyis/_/yang dag rtog la brtson pa yi/_/blo ldan skye bos gang brtsams pa'i/_/bstan bcos zab mo'i gzhung 'di la/_/don bzhin ma nor rtogs dka' yang /_/
[\[43b.4\]]mkhas pa rnams kyi rjes snyegs dang /_/bdag pas dman zhing rmongs rnams la/_/phan 'dogs snyam pa'i rnam rtog gis/_/de nyid brjed byang 'di brtsams so/_/bdag gi nus pa la ltos nas/_/dad byas gus pas brtsams pas na/_/gzhung dang mi
[\[43b.5\]]mthun 'gal smras rnams/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par mdzod/_/de kho na la 'jug pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dpal sbas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3893}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma d+h+ya ma ka na ya
[\[43b.6\]]sA ra sa mA sa pra kar Ni/_bod skad du/_dbu ma'i lugs kyi snying po mdor bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig thugs brtse'i ngang gyur pas/_/sems can rnams la dbu ma'i lam/_/mtha' yas pa dag ston mdzad cing /_/
[\[43b.7\]]the tshom ri bo mthon po'i rtse/_/ma lus rnam par 'joms pa po/_/tshig dbang gzhon nu'i gzugs mnga' ba/_/kun tu bzang po de la ni/_/phyag 'tshal nas de rgyas par bya/_/bde gshegs sras po smra mkhas rnams kyi dam pa gang /_/gsung
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]snyan gsal bas 'gro ba ma lus tshim par mdzad/_/gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang phyag na ut+pal sngo bsnams pa/_/thub dbang rgyal sras bcas pas gleng bstod rgyal ba mdzad/_/klus bod dri ma med blos bden pa gnyis la brten nas gus par ni/_/thub dbang
[\[44a.2\]]bka' lung rigs pa dag dang mi 'gal gtan la phab mod kyi/_/rmongs dang sdig pa'i grogs la brten pa'i dbang gis skyon dag rjod byed de/_/de phyir blo gros ldan rnams 'di la rtag tu rab gus bya ba'i rigs/_/thub pa khyu mchog dam pa thugs rje ldan pas mdo sde de dang de las sems
[\[44a.3\]]can la/_/srid 'gro'i sgo bzang dang de zhi ba'i bgrod pa gcig dang rnam gnyis bdag nyid chos 'di bstan/_/bshad pa gong ma la ni mkhas rnams rtsod pa'i lan gyis yul rnams mang po yod min na/_/nges par legs la blo rgya chen po rnams kyang rmongs te de phyir 'di la 'bad pa
[\[44a.4\]]byas/_/de ltar bsams nas che rnams rang don 'dod pas 'di la zhugs/_/des na bdag kyang blo gros chung bzhin de yi rjes su slob pa yis/_/zhugs pa yin pas mkhas pa rnams kyis cis kyang mi dpyad de/_/byis pa pha yi lam rjes 'brang ba smad par bya ma yin/_/dngos
[\[44a.5\]]dang dngos po med pa yi/_/gdon gyis thebs pas skye bo rnams/_/khams gsum 'khor bar bsams nas ni/_/de dag med pa 'dir brjod do/_/de la sgrib lam ma lus pa/_/dkrol phyir rnal 'byor can rnams la/_/lung dang rigs pa dag gis ni/_/phyi rol dngos po
[\[44a.6\]]dgag pa brjod/_/nang tsam yod pa nyid brten nas/_/phyi rol yod pa nyid bkag na/_/'di ltar phyi nas 'di yang ni/_/bde blag kho nar khegs par 'gyur/_/phung po la sogs yod pa dang /_/de ni med pa bzlog yin pas/_/de phyir de ni gang yin zhes/_/med pa nyid ni
[\[44a.7\]]gsal brjod dgos/_/ri bong rwa sogs gang yin pa/_/de mkhas rnams la med par grags/_/de dag bkag pas phung stsogs la/_/yod pa nyid du cis mi 'dod/_/de ni rigs min gang gi phyir/_/yod dang med par smra rnams kyi/_/de dag gnyi ga'ang ma grub ste/_/
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]phan tshun ltos nas gnas phyir ro/_/ba lang rwa las ltos te 'dir/_/ri bong rwa stsogs 'gog byed na/_/gang tshe de go yod min na/_/ji ltar de go med par 'dod/_/rags pa gcig pur 'gyur ba'am/_/rdul bsags bdag nyid 'gyur grang na/_/rnam pa gnyi ga 'ang rung min te/_/
[\[44b.2\]]de dag tshad mas gnod phyir ro/_/snang mi snang sogs mi rung phyir/_/snang ba'i spyod yul min pa'i phyir/_/de bas gzugs ni gnyi ga yi/_/bdag nyid du yang mi srid do/_/rdul phran so sor gse byas na/_/ba lang rwa ni mi dmigs te/_/de ma gtogs med de dag kyang /_/de yi rang
[\[44b.3\]]gi ngo bo min/_/rdul phran rnams kyang yang dag par/_/gcig pa nyid du rung min te/_/phyogs cha dbye bas tha dad pa'i/_/nyes pa la sogs bshad phyir ro/_/de ltas shes rab can rnams kyis/_/gang la ltos nas ri bong gi/_/rwa la sogs pa med 'dod pa/_/de med nyid du
[\[44b.4\]]nges rtogs bya/_/dngos po 'di kun de lta bu'i/_/chos can nyid pas mkhas rnams kyis/_/phan tshun ltos nas 'grub med pa/_/shin tu nges par shes par bya/_/de bas phyi rol gzung ba ni/_/rang gi ngo bor 'ga' med kyi/_/rab rib can la ji bzhin du/_/shes pa 'khrul
[\[44b.5\]]pa 'di nyid snang /_/'di kun gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das/_/kun mkhyen mgon po smra rnams kyi/_/dam pa thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa zhes/_/bya ba'i mdo las blo can gyis/_/blo tsam mthong bar bya ba'i phyir/_/rgyal sras blo gros chen
[\[44b.6\]]po la/_/bos nas gsal bar bka' stsal pa/_/skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu ma dang /_/rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/mgal me smig rgyu sna tshogs dag_/med bzhin du ni mi la snang /_/ji ltar mkha' la smig rgyu dang /_/rmi lam mo gsham bu rmi ba/_/de bzhin dngos por snang ba'i
[\[44b.7\]]sems/_/sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba yin/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_rkyen dang khams dang phung po dang /_/chos kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/btags rang gang zag sems dang ni/_/rmi lam skra shad 'dzings pa 'dra/_/zhes 'byung ba yin no/_/yang gsungs pa/_
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]rdul phran du ni ngas gzhigs shing /_/gzugs su rnam par mi brtag go/_/sems tsam rnam par gzhag pa ni/_/lta ba ngan pas mi dang ngo /_/zhes 'byung ba yin no/_/gal te 'di la phyi rol gyi/_/don du smra ba sogs byed de/_/sems tsam rnam par gzhag pa
[\[45a.2\]]ni/_/kho bo khas yang mi len na/_/de ci khyod ni kho bo la/_/sems tsam rnam par gzhag pa ni/_/lta ba ngan pas mi dang zhes/_/sgro btags skyon 'di rjod par byed/_/gang dag mi shes de skad du/_/rab tu smra ba de la 'dir/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs sogs kyi/_/mdo las
[\[45a.3\]]rgyal ba rnams kyis ni/_/khams gsum po dag sems tsam du/_/rnam pa mang du rab gsungs pa/_/lung ldan rigs pa bzang po de/_/blo ldan mdun du gsal bar brjod/_/gal te der gsungs tshad ma min/_/ci phyir khyod lung tshad ma yin/_/sangs rgyas gsungs phyir gnyi ga mtshungs/_/
[\[45a.4\]]ci phyir 'di la chos mi byed/_/gzhan yang /_gal te gzugs rdzas gud na yod/_/lha mi sha za la sogs kyi/_/blo ni phan tshun 'gal sgo nas/_/tha dad par yang ji ltar 'gyur/_/zad par chu sogs bsam gtan pa'i/_/sa ni ji ltar chu sogs 'gyur/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas ldan
[\[45a.5\]]pa la/_/de ni ji ltar mkhar yang 'gyur/_/gang phyir gcig la de lta bu'i/_/ngo bo yang dag mi rigs pa/_/de phyir tshad ma dang ldan pa'i/_/ngo bo nyid med rnam par mdzes/_/de bas grags pa gzhal yas pa'i/_/slob dpon chos kyi grags pa yis/_/shes rnam sna tshogs bsams
[\[45a.6\]]nas ni/_/nyid kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa/_/gzhan du dngos po gcig la ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs su snang ba yis/_/snang ba ji ltar bden 'gyur te/_/de yis gcig nyid nyams phyir ro/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/gal te ji ltar snang ba bzhin/_/gzugs ni
[\[45a.7\]]de bzhin yang dag gyur/_/de tshe 'bad pa med par yang /_/skye bo rnams ni grol bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang /_gal te dngos rnams yang dag tu/_/rang gi rgyu las byung 'dod na/_/rang gi ngo bo gnas bya'i phyir/_/de ni ji ste blo la ltos/_/gsal sogs rang gi rgyu las ni/_/
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]gsal sogs bdag nyid byung ba rnams/_/de yi bdag nyid 'gyur bya'i phyir/_/gzhan la nam yang mi ltos so/_/rdza mkhan sogs las byung ba yi/_/bum pa la sogs ji ltar yang /_/chu mi 'bo sogs rang don la/_/'ga' yang ltos par mi byed do/_/gal te phyi
[\[45b.2\]]rol rang rgyud yod/_/blo med par yang 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de lta bu yang mi snang ste/_/ji ltar de gzung de 'dzin 'dod/_/de bas blo gros ldan pa'i mchog_/grags pa mtha' yas zil gnon pa/_/slob dpon chos kyi grags pa yis/_/rang gi bstan bcos las bshad pa/_/
[\[45b.3\]]lta ba'i khyad par dang bral ba/_/mi 'dzin phyir de gzung 'dzin phyir/_/sngon por snang ba lta bu ste/_/'ba' zhig phyi rol don yod min/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang /_dngos rnams gang du dpyad pa ste/_/ngo bor yang dag nyid du med/_/'di ltar de dag gcig pa dang /_/du
[\[45b.4\]]ma'i ngo bor yod pa min/_/phung sogs khyad par mtshan nyid ni/_/byed pa'i khyad par nyid yin na/_/de yang yang dag ma yin pas/_/des kyang 'di dag mtshan nyid bral/_/zhes bshad do/_/de bzhin du/_don gyi rnam pa ldan pa yi/_/rnam par shes pa'ang cig shos kyis/_/phyi rol
[\[45b.5\]]yongs su gcod pa ni/_/rigs pas shin tu mi 'thad de/_/rmi lam la sogs gzhan snang bas/_/rnam pa tshad ma min phyir ro/_/nye ba dang ni mi ldan phyir/_/rnam pa med pa'i sems kyis min/_/gzhan du snang ba bstan pa yi/_/shes pas yongs su gcod na yang /_/khyad par med
[\[45b.6\]]pas thams cad kyis/_/thams cad rig par thal bar 'gyur/_/de lta bu dag kun bsams nas/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/_/dag pa'i chos ni skyed pa po/_/grags pa yis ni yang bsgrags pa/_/snang ba de don ngo bo ni/_/ma gtogs 'ol phyir don 'dzin na/_/ji lta bur na
[\[45b.7\]]bden pa yin/_/de 'dra bdag kyang mi shes so/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/de lta bas na blo ldan gyis/_/gzugs kyi rdzas su rnam mi brtag_/de yod thog ma med dus na/_/dngos zhes bya ba'i ltas ngan gyis/_/dkrugs pa'i sems ldan rnams kyi sems/_/gzung 'dzin rnam
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]rtog ces bya ba'i/_/mi bzad rlung gis bskyod pa gang /_/rab tu dang bar mi gnas so/_/gal te phyi rol don med na/_/de tshe mngon pa'i chos las ni/_/thub pas 'byung ba chen po yi/_/mtshan nyid gsungs pa shin tu 'gal/_/mtshan gzhi med par mtshan
[\[46a.2\]]nyid ni/_/mkhas pa 'ga' yang ston mi byed/_/de bas 'di ni ngo bo nyid/_/bcas par shin tu gsal rtogs bya/_/ma lus mkhyen pa'i skyob pa po/_/sman pa des 'dir gang du yang /_/med pa'i mtshan nyid ma gsungs te/_/dper na bdag gi lta bu'o zhes/_/mkhas pa kha cig
[\[46a.3\]]de skad du/_/'di la phyi ni zlog byed pa/_/de ni shin tu mi rigs zhes/_/blo bzang dbu ma gnas rnams smra/_/thams cad gzigs pas mtshan nyid ni/_/de dag yod pa las min gyi/_/der snang shes pa la brten nas/_/tha snyad du ni gsungs par zad/_/sra ba'i bdag nyid la sogs
[\[46a.4\]]kun/_/ye shes 'ba' zhig kho na snang /_/sems las gzhan pa'i snang ba ni/_/'ga' yang nam yang yod ma yin/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las/_/gsungs phyir de ltar khas blang bya/_/de las gnyis med gsungs pa yis/_/der snang shes pa yin bshad
[\[46a.5\]]de/_/ji skad du/_drod gsher g.yo ba sra ba'i chos/_/yang dag min las sgro btags nas/_/byis pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags/_/mtshan gzhi med cing mtshan nyid med/_/lus can sems ni gzung ba dang /_/'dzin pa'i dngos por 'jig 'gyur gyi/_/ji ltar byis pa
[\[46a.6\]]rnams brtags bzhin/_/snang ba'i mtshan nyid yod ma yin/_/ji ltar ri mo mtho dman du/_/snang yang yod pa ma yin pa/_/de bzhin dngos la dngos nyid du/_/snang yang yod pa ma yin no/_/ji ltar rab rib ldan pa yi/_/skye bos skra shad log bzung ba/_/de bzhin dngos por rtog
[\[46a.7\]]pa 'di/_/byis pas log par rnam par brtags/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/de phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'/_/ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du ni/_/shin tu rjes su sgrub mdzad cing /_/bde ba can gyi bde btang ba/_/brnyes par gzhol ba'i dgongs pa can/_/
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa/_/klu sgrub ces bya dang po yi/_/dbang phyug gis kyang bshad pa ni/_/'byung ba che la sogs bshad pa/_/rnam par shes su yang dag 'du/_/de shes pas ni 'bral 'gyur na/_/log par rnam brtags ma yin nam/_/zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[46b.2\]]pa yin no/_/phyi rol don zhig yod na ni/_/theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/_/mdo las kun mkhyen mnga' bdag gis/_/de skad gsungs pa mi rigs la/_/de yi gzhung lugs rjes 'gro ba'i/_/blo can slob dpon brtser ldan pa/_/de nyid mkhyen pa'ang de skad du/_/'chad pa
[\[46b.3\]]gtan du rigs ma yin/_/yang 'dir kha cig phyi rol gyi/_/dngos po grub par bya ba'i phyir/_/theg pa chen po'i mdo nyid dang /_/'gal ba shin tu rjod par byed/_/de ltar skyob pa bcom ldan 'das/_/kun mkhyen thub pa skyes mchog dang /_/de'i bka' ji skad gsungs pa 'dir/_/
[\[46b.4\]]ston de tshad mar 'dzin pa yi/_/mkhas pa kun la'ang tshad ma yin/_/gzhan ni 'ga' yang ma yin no/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi theg chen lung /_/de dang de las gsungs pas na/_/gal te khyod ni phyi rol gyi/_/dngos gtan med par khas len na/_/des gsungs pa yi mdo dag dang /_/'gal
[\[46b.5\]]ba rnam pa mang du snang /_/de ltas sems bzhin phyi rol gyi/_/don yang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/bshad pa'i phyir dang gsal bar ni/_/snang phyir yang dag nyid du yod/_/phyi rol don zhig gtan med na/_/'gro ba'i rtsa lag rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thugs rje'i dgongs pa dri med kyis/_/
[\[46b.6\]]theg chen sA lu ljang pa yi/_/mdo las rten cing 'byung ba yi/_/ngo bo rnams kyi khyad par dngos/_/gnyis su bstan pa ji ltar yang /_/'thad pa kho na ma yin no/_/de las dngos po thams cad ni/_/phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis/_/rnam pa gnyis su gsal bar bstan/_/de bas ngo bo
[\[46b.7\]]nyid med min/_/dgos pa med pa nyid du ni/_/bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yang /_/gnyis su bshad pa ji ltar yang /_/gsung ba ched cher mi mdzad la/_/kun gyi 'jug pa gang yin pa/_/de sngon 'gro ba yin pas na/_/blo rnal 'dug pa'i gdul ba yang /_/'ga' yang
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]de nyid gus mi 'os/_/ston pas mtshungs par bstan pa la/_/khyod kyis 'ga' zhig kho na la/_/yongs su blang zhing dor ba yi/_/nges pa 'di ko ci yi rgyus/_/de ltas rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/_/dngos po'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir/_/ma rig
[\[47a.2\]]la sogs yan lag bzhin/_/phyi rol dngos po'ang 'thad pa yin/_/de lta bu ni ma yin na/_/ji ltar rta yi rwa la sogs/_/med pa nyid du nges pa la/_/khyad par 'ga' yang yod min pa/_/de bzhin 'di la'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/mi mkhas pa dag de skad du/_/bcom ldan dgongs
[\[47a.3\]]pa mi shes par/_/shin tu rgol bar byed gyur pa/_/de la'ang 'dir ni brjod par bya/_/gnyis su bshad pa gang yin pa/_/de ni skye bo rnams dag la/_/grags pa'i ngor yin de tsam gyis/_/skye ba can rnams gnyis mi 'gyur/_/gzugs kyi phung por khyad med kyang /_/phyi dang
[\[47a.4\]]nang gi ngo bor ni/_/ji ltar gnyis su bshad pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'di la'ang nges par gzung /_/de ltar mig la sogs pa ni/_/nang gi yin pa nyid gnas la/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs phyi yi yang /_/gcig pa nyid du'ang 'gal ba med/_/gnyi ga'ang blo gros ngang tshul can/_/
[\[47a.5\]]yang dag mkhyen pas yang dag tu/_/g.yo ba med sogs bsgrub bya gang /_/de ni tha dad med par bstan/_/de bas gcig nyid na yang 'dir/_/bshad pa tha dad 'di mi 'gal/_/gdul ba'i ngor ni mgon po yis/_/bstan pa rnam pa sna tshogs so/_/gzhan yang /_gal te mdo
[\[47a.6\]]las bstan zhes te/_/bde gshegs dgongs pa ma brtags par/_/thams cad sgra bzhin bzung na ni/_/de yi tshe na bdag kyang ni/_/ci ste mi bzung de yang ni/_/'di ltar de yis de las gsungs/_/de lta bas na brtags te bzung /_/gzhan du ha cang thal bar 'gyur/_/dper
[\[47a.7\]]na bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/_/gdul ba'i dgos pa la gzigs nas/_/brdzus te skye ba bstan pa ltar/_/de bzhin phung po la sogs bstan/_/de lta bas na thub pa yi/_/dbu ma'i lugs ni gsal mdzad pa/_/slob dpon blo chen mkhas pa yi/_/rigs pa drug cu las bshad
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]pa/_/dgos pa'i dbang gis rgyal ba rnams/_/nga dang nga'i zhes gsungs pa ltar/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/_/de bzhin dgos pa'i dbang gis gsungs/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de lta bas na de'i stobs kyis/_/dngos rnams ngo bo nyid bcas pa/_/rnam pa kun du
[\[47b.2\]]yod min par/_/gzhung 'dzin mkhas pa rnams kyis soms/_/zhar la 'ongs pa'i gtam gyis chog_/blo tsam zhes pa 'di la ni/_/tshad ma yang ni gsal bar yod/_/tshad ma dang bral tshig dag ni/_/mkhas rnams mgu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/brtsad pa'i spyod yul gyur pa'i mi/_/gnyid
[\[47b.3\]]ma log pa'i mig sogs blo/_/yang dag phyi rol snang min te/_/blo phyir rmi lam blo bzhin no/_/de la sogs pa'i tshad mas kyang /_/sems tsam yin pa'i tshul du nges/_/blo tsam grub pa'i lung yang ni/_/blo can blo ni rgyas byed pa/_/lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo sde zhes/_/bya ba gsal ba
[\[47b.4\]]nyid dmigs te/_/ji skad du/_ji ltar byis pa rnam brtags bzhin/_/phyi rol don yod ma yin te/_/bag chags kyis ni dkrugs pa'i sems/_/don du snang bar 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu yin no/_/phyi rol gzung ba bkag kyang ni/_/khyod kyi lta bu
[\[47b.5\]]sems tsam lugs/_/'grub par mi 'gyur gang gi phyir/_/sems ni de la rag lus brjod/_/shes bya med na ji lta bur/_/de la rag lus shes pa 'grub/_/shes pa gnyis su snang ba yis/_/dben zhes bya ba'ang gzu lums che/_/de nyid dgongs nas slob dpon che/_/bde
[\[47b.6\]]gshegs thugs rje'i nor can la/_/bstod mdzad klu zhes bod pa yin/_/bstod pa las kyang gsungs pa ni/_/ma shes par na shes bya min/_/de med par yang shes pa min/_/de phyir khyod kyis shes pa dang /_/shes bya ngo bo nyid med gsungs/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de 'dzin
[\[47b.7\]]tshad ma med pa'i phyir/_/de yod rab tu mi 'grub bo/_/de yod 'bad pa med nyid du/_/khyod ni yang dag mthong bar 'gyur/_/de ltas 'di yang phyi rol bzhin/_/gcig dang du ma'i bdag nyid du/_/mi rung gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin/_/ngo bo med par gsal shes kyis/_/
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]theg chen rab tu ston pa'i lung /_/shes rab pha rol phyin sogs shes/_/bya ba las kyang bdag med par/_/nges par khong du chud bya ste/_/gal te gnyis med shes pa zhig_/yang dag nyid yod de yi tshe/_/rgyal bas dngos po phra rab kyang /_/dgag
[\[48a.2\]]pa gsung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/shes rab ces brjod mdo las ni/_/dngos po skra yi rtse mo'i cha/_/bzhag pa tsam yang bsal ba'i phyir/_/de med rigs pa kho na yin/_/sangs rgyas kun yum rdo rje zhes/_/bya ba las kyang skyob pa yis/_/sems kyi rgyun ni rgyun med gsungs/_/
[\[48a.3\]]de bas sems ni yang dag min/_/'das pa'i sems kyang sangs rgyas kyis/_/ji lta bur yang ma dmigs la/_/ma 'ongs yod par ma yin te/_/da ltar gyi yang ma dmigs so/_/yang dag nyid du sems yod na/_/dkon mchog brtsegs las bdag nyid ches/_/'od
[\[48a.4\]]srungs las ni gsungs pa gang /_/de yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/_/ting 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las kyang /_/yod dang med pa nyid dag gi_/dbus la'ang gnas pa bkag pa 'di/_/ngo bo nyid med zur gyis gsungs/_/'phags pa lang kar zhes brjod pa'i/_/mdo las sangs
[\[48a.5\]]rgyas rnams kyis yang /_/tshigs bcad dag gis gsal gsungs te/_/de ltar dngos med rigs ldan nyid/_/ji skad gsungs she na/_ji ltar gzugs ni me long la/_/de nyid gzhan nyid rnam spangs par/_/snang yang de yi ngo bor min/_/de bzhin dngos la dngos nyid do/_/blo yis
[\[48a.6\]]rnam par gzhigs rnams kyi/_/ngo bo nyid ni nges mi zin/_/de bas de dag brjod med dang /_/ngo bo nyid kyang med par brjod/_/ces 'byung ba yin no/_/gal te dngos po gang dag yod/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang dag nyid/_/dris nas 'phags pa dri med grags/_/ci phyir de tshe
[\[48a.7\]]mi gsung bzhugs/_/de skad gzhung lugs mthun pa la/_/gnas pa'i skyes bu 'khod pa ni/_/dris na blo dang ldan pa dag_/mi smrar rigs pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang /_ma dros pa zhes bya ba yi/_/mdo las bcom ldan gyis gsungs gang /_/des kyang rkyen la rag las te/_/skye bo
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]ngo bo nyid med nyid/_/ji skad du gsungs she na/_rkyen las gang skye de ni ma skyes pa/_/de la ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba med/_/rkyen la rag las gang de stong par bshad/_/gang zhig stong nyid shes de bag yod yin/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de bzhin du/_'phags pa klu dbang rgya mtsho yis/_/
[\[48b.2\]]zhus pa las kyang bcom ldan gyis/_/dngos rnams rten cing 'brel 'byung phyir/_/ngo bo nyid ni med gsungs te/_/gang dag rten cing 'brel te byung /_/de dag ngo bo nyid 'ga' 'ang med/_/gang dag ngo bo nyid med pa/_/de dag gang du'ang 'byung ba med/_/ces bya ba yin no/_/de bzhin glang
[\[48b.3\]]po'i rtsal las kyang /_/bcom ldan thub pa skyes mchog gis/_/dus gsum rtogs pa'i dngos po rnams/_/ngo bo nyid med rab gsal gsungs/_/gang la skye ba srid pa yi/_/chos ni 'ga' yang med rnyed de/_/skye ba med pa'i chos rnams la/_/byis pa rnams ni skye bar 'dod/_/ces
[\[48b.4\]]bya ba yin no/_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas las kyang ni/_/thams cad gzigs pas dngos rnams kyi/_/skyed par byed pa nyid gsal bas/_/dngos kun bdag med nyid du gsungs/_/ji skad du gsungs she na/_gang la rang bzhin yod pa ma yin pa/_/rang bzhin med de gzhan
[\[48b.5\]]rkyen ji ltar 'gyur/_/rang bzhin med pas gzhan ci skyed 'gyur zhes/_/rgyu 'di bde bar gshegs pas bstan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de bzhin klu dbang rgya mtsho yis/_/zhus pa che las thub pa yis/_/dus gsum 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams/_rang bzhin med par gsungs
[\[48b.6\]]nyid de/_/sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' stong zhing /_/skye dang 'jig dang gnas pa'i dngos po stong /_/'di ni dngos yod ma yin dngos med min/_/chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/gzhan yang /_dngos po khas len yod na ni/_/sa
[\[48b.7\]]bcu pa yi mdo las gang /_/skye mched mnyam pa nyid gsungs te/_/ji ltar rtsod pa med par 'gyur/_/ji skad du gsungs she na/_sa lnga pa las sa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par byas pa mnyam pa nyid bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa 'jug go/_/bcu gang
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mtshan ma med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med par mnyam pa nyid dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa ste/_dngos
[\[49a.2\]]po thams cad rang bzhin med pa rjod par byed pas dus gsum du gnas pa'i dngos po'i rigs ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du gsal lo zhes bya bar nges par zung shig_/de bzhin du 'phags pa ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba'i mdo las kyang /_dngos po thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ji lta ba
[\[49a.3\]]bzhin du bstan pa kho na ste/_de bstan pa/_de bzhin dngos zhig srid na ni/_/ma skyes dgra yi 'gyod bsal las/_/chos rnams mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/mnyam nyid gsungs par ji ltar rigs/_/ji skad du gsungs she na/_rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir/_
[\[49a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par 'du'o/_/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_chos gang ma skyes shing ma byung ba de kun nas nyon mongs par nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_de brtsal bar nus sam/_smras pa/_'jam
[\[49a.5\]]dpal ma lags so/_/smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos thams cad mya ngan las 'da' bar yang dag par 'du bar mkhyen te/_des na de dag gis khyod kyi 'gyod pa bstsal bar mi spyod do/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshul bzhin du
[\[49a.6\]]rab tu sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du ston par mdzad pas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du gsal bar bstan pa yin no/_/gang phyir mya ngan 'das dngos min/_/dngos po med pa'ang rung min nyid/_/de phyir dngos rnams de dang ni/_/mnyam
[\[49a.7\]]par ngo bo nyid med do/_/mya ngan 'das pa dngos nyid na/_/'dus byas nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/de phyir de ni 'bad med par/_/'dus byas mtshan nyid ldan par 'gyur/_/'on te 'dus ma byas par 'dod/_/de ni mkha' dang 'dra 'gyur bar/_/de dngos nyid du rnam pa ni/_/gnyi
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]gar yang rung min par mngon/_/gal te mya ngan 'das dngos med/_/de'i lam sgom pa don med 'gyur/_/de ni de yi stobs kyis su/_/'thob par yang ni 'thad ma yin/_/ji ltar de yi stobs kyis ni/_/mo gsham bu 'thob min pa ltar/_/de bzhin dngos med khyad med phyir/_/de
[\[49b.2\]]yi de yang rigs ma yin/_/gang gi mthu dang ldan pas kyang /_/mo gsham bu ni thob med cing /_/'byung ba'ang yod min de yi phyir/_/de dngos med pa nyid kyang med/_/de kun yang dag gzigs nas ni/_/dpal ldan klu sgrub ces bya ba/_/sa ni dang po bskrun brnyes pa/_/mkhas pa'i
[\[49b.3\]]mchog rab kyis bshad pa/_/mya ngan 'das dngos med min na/_/de dngos nyid lta ga la yin/_/dngos dang dngos med 'dzin zad pa/_/mya ngan 'das pa zhes brjod do/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/gnyi ga'i phyogs bshad nyes phyir 'di/_/gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin/_/
[\[49b.4\]]phan tshun med pa'i ngo bor rnams/_/gcig med rnam par bcad pa yis/_/cig shos yod par thal phyir te/_/gnyi ga min bdag kyang min pas/_/de rnams kun du nam mkha' yi/_/me tog bzhin du srid pa med/_/gang tshe rab tu spyad na tshad ma'i stobs kyi dngos/_/dus gsum
[\[49b.5\]]gang du'ang 'ga' yang mi gnas rab gsal na/_/de la rag lus 'grub pas dngos po'i zlar gyur pas/_/ji ltar de yi bdag nyid dag tu yod par 'gyur/_/gal te dngos po rnam par brtags nas de 'gog na/_/de ltar blos byed de brtags kho nar mi 'gyur ram/_/gang phyir
[\[49b.6\]]gnyi ga'ang rigs pa'i stobs kyis mi 'grub pa/_/de phyir mkhas pa rnams kyis der 'dzin thag bsrings 'or/_/de bas blo ldan legs byed pa/_/snying rje dpag tu med sems ldan/_/ye shes snying po mkhas pa yis/_/gdul blo rgyas bya'i phyir bshad pa/_/dgag par bya ba med
[\[49b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_/yang dag tu na bkag med gsal/_/yang dag chos kun mi len pa/_/de ni de nyid rig pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo las kyang /_/bdag nyid chen po thugs brtse bas/_/sems can rnams kyi gnyis 'dzin pa/_/
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]bzlog par bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa/_/ma byung ba las gang 'byung zhing /_/byung nas kyang ni 'jig 'gyur ba/_/rkyen gyis yod dang med pa des/_/nga yi bstan la mi gnas so/_/gang la cung zad skye med cing /_/'gag pa ci yang yod min par/_/'gro
[\[50a.2\]]ba dben par mthong ba ni/_/de la yod dang med nyid med/_/ces bya ba la sogs pas gnyis su lta ba dang bral ba nyid gsal bar rab tu bstan to/_/de bzhin 'di las yang gsungs pa/_/yod pa'i zlas drangs med pa ste/_/yod pa'ang med pa'i zlas drangs so/_/de bas med par
[\[50a.3\]]brjod mi bya/_/yod pa nyid du'ang mi brtag go/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i gdon gyis 'debs pa med pa kho na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gsal rab tu gzhung btsugs pa yin pas mjug bsdu'o/_/bdag nyid dran par bya ba'i phyir/_/mdor
[\[50a.4\]]bsdus cung zad bdag gis bsgrags/_/'di ni mgo smos go rnams la/_/dbu ma'i lam gyi phyogs yin no/_/sangs rgyas dngos dang dngos med bshig pas mtho ba'i che bas dbang phyug rab brnyes shing /_/srid gsum don gyi de nyid mkhyen la thugs rjes 'khor ba ji srid
[\[50a.5\]]bzhugs pa'i lugs/_/lung dang rigs pas rab tu gsal byas bsod nams gzhal yas thob pa gang yin des/_/mtha' dag dngos por lta ba'i ling tog ma lus sel zhing 'di la dga' bar shog_/dbu ma'i lugs kyi snying po mdor bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon bid+yA ka
[\[50a.6\]]ra pra b+has mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha ba dang /_/zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3894}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_na rA kA ra biM shi kA/_bod skad
[\[50a.7\]]du/_rnam pa med pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shes rab 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal dpa' bo ni/_/'jig rten kun gyi bde skyed pa'i/_/mgon po la ni mgos phyag 'tshal/_/rnam pa kun las
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]rnam grol ba'i/_/shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_/yang dag don dam yin pa ru/_/lung rigs mkhas pa gzhan dag 'dod/_/rnam pa zad pa bden pa ste/_/rnam pa yang ni brdzun pa yin/_/ji srid du ni rnam pa snang /_/de srid shes skye 'khrul pa yin/_/zad pa med pa'i 'khrul
[\[50b.2\]]rgyud la/_/shes pa rnam pa med 'dzin pa/_/'khrul pa thams cad kyi ni gzhi/_/shes pa rnam med bdag nyid yin/_/'on te shes nyid 'khrul yin na/_/nam mkha' 'ang 'khrul pa med mi srid/_/'khrul pa rgyu med yin zhe na/_/rtag tu yod par thal bar 'gyur/_/rgyu dang
[\[50b.3\]]bcas na brdzun min te/_/de ni gzhan dbang yin par gsal/_/mngon sum mam ni rjes dpag gis/_/rnam pa med par sgrub par byed/_/rnam pa de las log pas na/_/mngon sum gyis ni rtogs ma yin/_/brdzun par snang ba'i shes pa ni/_/'khrul nyid phyir na tshad ma min/_/
[\[50b.4\]]shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/_/da ltar nyams su myong ba med/_/rang bzhin 'khrul pa 'byung ba'i phyir/_/de phyir mngon sum tshad ma min/_/chos can mngon sum ma grub la/_/rjes dpag nges par 'jug pa med/_/brdzun pa'i rnam pa rtags yin phyir/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed
[\[50b.5\]]gnas pa med/_/mngon sum 'khrul dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/rjes su dpag pa'ang bslad pa yin/_/de phyir rnam pa med sgrub pa'i/_/tshad ma nyid ni yod ma yin/_/rnam pa med par lung gis kyang /_/sgrub par byed pa'i gsung rab med/_/rmi lam sgyu ma dang mtshungs par/_/chos
[\[50b.6\]]kun sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan/_/lung dang rigs pa gnyis kyis gsal bar rab grub pa/_/gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs shes pa'i rang bzhin rnam dag pa/_/gsal bar snang ba ma lus gzhi ni rnam spangs pa/_/rnam pa med par snang ba'i gsal 'ga' yod ma yin/_/
[\[50b.7\]]du ma zhe'am gcig nyid yin/_/brtags par 'gyur phyir de nyid min/_/ma khyab ce na'ang khyab nyid yin/_/mi gsal ba'am gsal ba nyid/_/mi rtag pa la rtag ces pa/_/bdag tu smra dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/mi rtag skad cig yin smra na/_/de dag phan tshun ldan pa med/_/
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]rnam pa'i skabs na shes yin na/_/ji ltar khyab pa zhes byar brjod/_/rnam pa brdzun pa yin pa'i phyir/_/khyab pa'i nus pa yod mi srid/_/shes pa khyab pa'i nus med la/_/'dod na 'dir mkhas ji ltar yin/_/nam mkha' khyab bya yin zhe na/_/nam mkha' yod par 'dod dam ci/_/nam
[\[51a.2\]]mkha' sun ni phyung nyid kyis/_/shes pa sun ni byung ba 'thob/_/gcig dang du ma dang bral bas/_/shes pa'ang brdzun pa nyid du 'gyur/_/shes pa rnam med mtha' yas pa ru snang /_/longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis kyi/_/gzhi ru nges pa
[\[51a.3\]]tshogs gnyis dang ldan nyid/_/de 'dra dpal ldan chos sku yin zhes smra/_/rnam pa med pa'i shes pa nam mkha' dang 'dra chos kyi sku/_/gang tshe rnam pa des bskyed de yang 'khrul tshogs cis ma yin/_/'on te brdzun par rtogs phyir de 'khrul grub pa yod min na/_/brdzun 'gyur mi rigs de ni
[\[51a.4\]]gzhan dbang ma yin nam/_/rnam pa thams cad mi gsal zhe na khyed kyi rnam med ci zhig bya/_/rnam pa thams cad gsal yin zhe na khyod kyi rnam med ci zhig bya/_/rnam bsregs shes pa'i rnam pa ji ltar srid par 'gyur/_/srid na'ang de yi rnam pa sngon med ji ltar 'gyur/_/chags bral
[\[51a.5\]]'dod chags phyir yang skye med bzhin/_/gal te skye na de yi chags nyid thogs pa med par 'gyur/_/'on te sgyu ma nyid du rtogs phyir de dag 'khrul med na/_/de bzhin 'on te yod na rnam med 'bras bu ci zhig yod/_/rnam pa med pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa bal yul gyi paN+Di ta dga' ba'i
[\[51a.6\]]dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3895}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A lo ka mA la pra ka ra Na nA ma/_bod skad du/_snang ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa/_mi shes gsum ni spang ba'i phyir/_/rang bzhin gsum ni bsgoms pa yis/_/gang gis
[\[51a.7\]]sems tsam du gsungs pa/_/thub dbang de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/srid gsum mtha' ru byon pas spros gsungs pa/_/bsdus nas sems kyi rnam par rtog pa tsam/_/gal te de dag sems las ma lus spangs/_/yang srid 'ching ba'i skye ba yod ma yin/_/srid dang thar pa yongs
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]shes pas/_/de spangs thob pa'i 'bras bu 'byung /_/blo gros bzang po thams cad ni/_/nang sems pa la brtson pa yin/_/'dod chags la sogs drir bcas sems/_/'khor yin de las dben pa nyid/_/sgrib pa spangs pa'i rgyal ba yis/_/bsdus nas thar pa yin par gsungs/_/
[\[51b.2\]]'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ni/_/lus can rang sems rtog pa yin/_/gang zhig chos ni gzhan dag kyang /_/byis pas brtag pa brdzun bdag nyid/_/dam pa'i don gyi rtog pa la'ang /_/mkhas pa de yis gnas mi bya/_/dge ba'am mi dge ba yi yang /_/rtog la bye brag ci zhig yod/_/
[\[51b.3\]]brten cing dbye ba la brten pa'i/_/mes sreg nyid du bye brag med/_/tsan dan gyi ni me 'dis kyang /_/reg pa tsam gyis sreg pa nyid/_/rnam par rtog pa chung ngu yang /_/thams cad nyid du spang bar bya/_/'khrul pa'i ngo bo rnam rtog gis/_/sems ni mngon par bslad pa yin/_/'khrul pa
[\[51b.4\]]yang ni ma dag phyir/_/mig 'phrul gyi ni rnam 'phrul yin/_/mig 'phrul yang ni shes bya ste/_/sems kyi yang ni rnam 'phrul yin/_/de phyir sems kyi de dang de/_/'khrul par gnyis su med pa blta/_/dbu ma'i lam ni de nyid de/_/de nyid chos kyi bdag med pa/_/yang dag
[\[51b.5\]]mtha' yang de yin te/_/de nyid de bzhin nyid stong nyid/_/chos rnams mnyam nyid de grol nyid/_/de nyid rnam par rig tsam nyid/_/chos kun nang du chud pa'i phyir/_/ring ba ma yin nye ba'ang min/_/de nyid rtogs par dka' bas na/_/'di yi ngo bo dpyad mi nus/_/rang rig de yang phra
[\[51b.6\]]ba'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi phra ba gzigs/_/rang la gnas kyang bdag 'dra bas/_/rtsing ba'i phyir ni mthong ba med/_/nam yang rnal 'byor rig pa yin/_/thar pa ring snyam mi bsam ste/_/brtags pa'i ngo bos stong pa nyid/_/rang dngos mthong bas mya ngan 'das/_/nyi chu
[\[51b.7\]]rab rib rmi lam dang /_/dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa/_/'khrul pa yis kyang dgos byed do/_/'khrul pa gzhan dag bzlog phyir ro/_/yul du kun brtags de dang des/_/sad pa 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/rmi lam [(]bltan [,]bstan [)]pa'ang de yi shugs/_/mi bzad pa yi bag chags dug_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]e ma'o brdzun pa'i rnam rtog gi_/rgyun ni shin tu mthug pa ste/_/rmi lam las kyang rmi lam gzhan/_/chu bur steng du chu bur bzhin/_/yang dag ma yin don snang bas/_/yang dag don ni bsgribs nas gnas/_/ma rig pa yis bskyed pa nyid/_/mig ser nad
[\[52a.2\]]kyis btab pa bzhin/_/tha dad min pa'ang tha dad dang /_/phyi rol min pa'ang phyi rol du/_/yul gyi rnam pa'i rnyog pa yis/_/sems ni rnam pa du mar snang /_/nyi ma zla ba nam mkha' dang /_/skar ma'i tshogs dang sa rnams dang /_/chu bo'i rgya mtsho phyogs dang ni/_/'di dag sems kyi sprul pa'o/_/
[\[52a.3\]]srid pa'i rtse mos yongs bcad pa/_/khams gsum po ni 'di dag par/_/ji ltar snang ba 'di thams cad/_/rnam shes dug gi thig le yin/_/gal te snang na ji ltar med/_/snang ba ji ltar med dngos yin/_/snang phyir yod pa snang ma yin/_/ci ga rmi lam mi snang ngam/_/lhag pa'i dri
[\[52a.4\]]ma skyes pa yis/_/rang gi ngo bo nges rtogs bsgribs/_/gzhan gyi ngo bo snang ba ste/_/blo rnams shel dang 'dra ba yin/_/rang bzhin nyid ni mi snang ba'am/_/dus kyi brtsegs pa thob pa yis/_/'du byed bag chags kyis bsgos pas/_/rnam par rtog pa snang bar 'gyur/_/sems
[\[52a.5\]]ni rnam par bslad pa'i phyir/_/gcig nyid gnyis su snang ba yin/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba la/_/shin tu mkhas pa cis ma yin/_/gzung ba'i rnam pa mi g.yo'i phyir/_/phyi rol lta bu nyid du gnas/_/'dzin pa'ang srog dang bcas pa'i phyir/_/nang ni g.yo ba lta bu nyid/_/
[\[52a.6\]]'dir ni phyi nang cung zad med/_/phan tshun dag ni grub pa'i phyir/_/bar na ma yin med min te/_/sems tsam du ni gnas phyir ro/_/dbang po'i grong du 'dod chags med/_/don rnams la min sems la min/_/bdag la gnas min gzhan gnas min/_/de ni yod min med pa'ang
[\[52a.7\]]min/_/ma brtags 'brel pa'i rgyu yis ni/_/sems ni 'khrul par gyur las yin/_/ga la yin yang sprin nang nas/_/gnam lcags 'bab par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nyon mongs rigs gzhan gang yin pa'ang /_/khams gsum du ni
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]khyab byed pa/_/rtog pa'i dug las kun tu byung /_/rtog pa yang ni gzhi med pa/_/yang dag nyid du yod ma yin/_/'ga' yis me lce 'bar ba ni/_/nam mkha' la mched mthong ngam ci/_/mi sdug la sogs gnyen po'i phyogs/_/thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa ni/_/dug zin
[\[52b.2\]]dogs pa zhi ba'i phyir/_/mkhas pas brdzun gyi bsngags bzhin no/_/kun da zla ba pad sogs med/_/bshad sogs med cing dngos yod min/_/sad pa'i skabs kyi bud med lus/_/rmi lam gyi ni skabs bzhin no/_/'dod chags dang ni chags bral nyid/_/de ltar shes na gnyi ga brdzun/_/
[\[52b.3\]]'ga' zhig chad pa phye ba la/_/chags pa ma yin chags med min/_/gang zhig chags dang bral ba des/_/slar yang chags kyi the tshom med/_/de phyir 'dod spong don gnyer bas/_/chags bral la yang brten mi bya/_/e ma'o 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/_/lam 'di rnam par dben pa nyid/_/
[\[52b.4\]]gang zhig gzhan gyi tshig bden na/_/de nyid kho nas tshig 'di brdzun/_/gnod pa byed la bden par yang /_/gang zhig smra bar brdzun pa nyid/_/bden dang brdzun par ci zhig dngos/_/gang zhig gzhan don byed de bden/_/bden la bden pa'i ye shes ni/_/mkhas pas bden par gsungs pa
[\[52b.5\]]yin/_/bden pa brdzun par 'thob pa yis/_/bden pa la ni gnas mi bya/_/byis pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi tshig_/bden pa las ni brdzun pa mchog_/thos blo de nyid min pa'i phyir/_/thams cad mthar ni de'i bdag nyid/_/dngos po gang gang rnam brtags pa/_/de dag thams cad
[\[52b.6\]]brdzun pa yin/_/de bden de ni yang dag mtha'/_/gang zhig ma brtags de nyid yin/_/e ma'o skyes bu ma dul ba/_/de nyid phyir ni gnas med pas/_/sgrub pa dang ni sun 'byin pas/_/ji ltar mos pa'i don du 'jog_/theg pa chen po mi shes pas/_/blun pa 'di ni legs
[\[52b.7\]]pa yin/_/lam nor ba las 'phye bo nyid/_/mgyogs pa ma yin ring phyin brlag_/gang dag theg pa che la gus/_/de ni bde bar gshegs pa pa/_/rang sde gzhan dag sman la gzhol/_/lam min g.yang sar 'khor phyir ro/_/sems ni yang dag 'jug pa yi/_/rnam par
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]dpyod la mi 'jug gi_/'khor ba rab tu spang ba'i phyir/_/thams cad blo ni mtshungs pa yin/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa de/_/thog mtha' med pa'i bdag nyid can/_/'khor ba'i rang bzhin 'di ci zhes/_/shes rab can gyi yongs su tshol/_/sna tshogs 'di
[\[53a.2\]]dag gang las 'byung /_/gang du yang ni 'gag par 'gyur/_/rang gi bag chags sa bon gyi/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa las/_/gnyid log brgyal dang mi dran dang /_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pa las/_/snyoms par 'jug las ldang bas na/_/sa bon thams cad pa nges
[\[53a.3\]]grub/_/dbang don las byung thams cad ni/_/'jug pa'i rnam par shes zhes bya/_/kun rnams shes dang tha dad min/_/phyir yang de ru 'gag par 'gyur/_/chu g.yos pa las de dang der/_/rlabs ni tha dad dngos 'byung bzhin/_/skad cig la ni snang ba nyid/_/phyir yang mi
[\[53a.4\]]g.yo gnyid log bzhin/_/de ni gnyis snang gang yin pa/_/rigs pa'i spyod yul de ma yin/_/skad cig la ni brjod pa yin/_/sgra dang sgra brnyan ji bzhin no/_/sgyu ma mkhan gyis skad cig la/_/rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa na/_/'ga' zhig gsang ba'i gnas shes la/_/rang
[\[53a.5\]]bzhin rnam par gnas pa bzhin/_/byis pa rnams la gzhan du snang /_/mkhas la dngos po gzhan yin te/_/sngo dang dmar por nges snang ba'i/_/gtsang sbra yi ni bdag nyid bzhin/_/'di yi rang bzhin dri med 'dod/_/rnam pa med cing brjod du med/_/sangs rgyas min pas nam yang
[\[53a.6\]]ni/_/de yi ngo bo shes mi nus/_/tha mal skye bo 'di dag bzhin/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen min/_/rab tu grags pa de nyid de/_/de nyid kho na des mkhyen no/_/lung dang bstan bcos la dris nas/_/bdag cag smra ba 'ba' zhig tsam/_/mig dang ldan pa'i spyod yul gyi/_/
[\[53a.7\]]gzugs ni dmus long rnams kyis bzhin/_/ye shes mig sman khyad par gyis/_/gnas skabs de ru ma 'ongs 'gyur/_/gang phyir thub pa'i dbang po bzhin/_/bdag cag de nyid bden mthong 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams kyis yang dang yang /_/'dir ni gang dang gang bsgoms pa/_/de
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]dang de la mdun na snang /_/bsgoms pa'i stobs las byung ba yi/_/gos rnams bsgos kyang ma goms pas/_/yan lag la ni gnod pa yis/_/shin tu grang ba'i ba mos kyang /_/mig la ma yin ngo mtshar che/_/goms pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa'i phyir/_/lag pas kyang ni nyid byed
[\[53b.2\]]pa'i/_/mnyed mkhan la ni lpags pa yi/_/dri ngas shin tu gnod pa med/_/lus dang ldan pas thog ma ru/_/dug zos pas ni 'chi ba nyid/_/de nyid goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mthar ni bcud kyis len du 'gyur/_/'byung ba rnams kyang ga las byung /_/las las skyes zhes
[\[53b.3\]]mi rigs te/_/'byung rnams de dang 'brel med de/_/las kyi bag chags sems gnas phyir/_/legs byas rgyu yi rnam rig ni/_/de phyir zhi ba'i rnam pa yin/_/stag dang seng ge dom dang sbrul/_/gsod cing shin tu 'jigs pa yin/_/gal te shes pa'i dngos nyid la/_/'byung bar
[\[53b.4\]]brtag pa ma yin na/_/rkang pa lag pa'i g.yob la sogs/_/ji ltar gzhan las byas par 'gyur/_/rlung las she na rlung gang las/_/'bad pa yis na de gang las/_/gal te 'dod yin de nyid ni/_/khyod ni lam du nges par zhugs/_/pha ma'i khu ba khrag dag las/_/mgo dang rkang
[\[53b.5\]]sogs ngo bo dang /_/shing rnams dngos po sa bon las/_/ji ltar skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur/_/kha las sgra ni ci phyir dang /_/rdza rnga las ni yang 'byung ba/_/tha dad pa yi rgyu 'di las/_/dngos dang dngos po med par snang /_/bya rnams nam mkha' la lding zhing /_/mun pa'i nang du dngos
[\[53b.6\]]mthong dang /_/khung du byi ba la sogs dang /_/nya rnams kyis ni chu nang du/_/sbrul rnams kyi ni mig gnyis kyis/_/thos pa dang ni mthong ba yin/_/'gal ba gzhan dang gzhan rnams ni/_/de bzhin du ma 'khor ba bsten/_/gnas dang gnas pa ma mthong ba'i/_/goms
[\[53b.7\]]pas dgra la phog pa yi/_/shes pa'i rtog pa ma rtogs par/_/'ben la mi 'chor ji ltar phog_/chu yi rgyun ni ci bzhin du/_/gal te rnam shes rgyu min na/_/dang po bzung ba goms med shor/_/phyi nas bzung 'di dgos ma yin/_/ri bo rnams ni mtho gyur dang /_/
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]rgya mtsho chen po gting dpag dka'/_/phra rab rnams ni 'dus pa yi/_/bya ba med na su yis bya/_/nus dang ldan pas byas na ni/_/de nyid smyon pa bzhin du yang /_/bdag gis 'bad pa zhes bya bas/_/'jig pa'i dus la ji ltar 'jig_/khab long
[\[54a.2\]]gis ni rdo sogs kyi/_/lcags la sogs pa 'dren phyir dang /_/sman dang sngags la sogs pa yi/_/nus pa su zhig gis ni sprul/_/de phyir ma rig sna tshogs pas/_/cog chung sgra snyan rgya chen bzhin/_/ji ltar snang ba 'di thams cad/_/de dag sems kyis nye bar sprul/_zad
[\[54a.3\]]par bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/ci lta bur ni yang dag 'grub/_/brtan pa'i rang bzhin dngos po rnams/_/gzhan dang gzhan du ji ltar gzhag_/des na 'khrul par rigs pa yin/_/rnam pa du ma'i shel bzhin du/_/'di dag sems kyis khyab pa ste/_/bag chags chu la til
[\[54a.4\]]mar bzhin/_/'jig rten pa yi ngo mtshar rnams/_/'ga' la'ang ngo mtshar gyur ma yin/_/sa bon thams cad sa la ni/_/'di dag ma lus yod ces bsam/_/ji ltar phyi rol gnas snang ba/_/re zhig dngos 'di yod yin na/_/de dag yod pa nyid du yang /_/khyed kyis ci ltar nges
[\[54a.5\]]par bzung /_/e ma sems yin zhe na rigs/_/rgyu med par ni ci phyir sdang /_/gang yin de ni rnam pa ni/_/bag chags 'bras bu mi 'dod dam/_/rnam par shes pa phyir byung nas/_/phyi yi yul rnams 'dzin nam ci/_/thog nas de ci yod dam med/_/gal te yod na yul ci dgos/_/
[\[54a.6\]]lung gi don ni nges yin na/_/mngon sum don la lung ci dgos/_/mi snang 'jig rten pha rol sogs/_/lung las gsungs pa'i rjes 'brang rtogs/_/drang ba'i don yin phyir yang ste/_/lung gis yod par 'grub ma yin/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched kyang /_/bstan pa sems
[\[54a.7\]]kyi spyod yul lo/_/rang gi sa bon las skye bas/_/dbang po rnams kyang sems nyid yin/_/yul gyi rnam pa skye ba la'ang /_/de nyid la ni yul du brjod/_/'di dag blo yi cha yin par/_/mkhas pa yis ni yongs su rtogs/_/cha shas med pa'i sems 'di la/_/'jig rten
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]kun rdzob bden par yod/_/'di la mig med gzugs kyang med/_/snang ba med cing yid byed med/_/rmi lam lta bu'i 'khrul pa'i sems/_/thams cad yod min med pa'ang min/_/bzang dang ngan pa'i grogs bsten las/_/rgyud ni gang yin khyad par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi sems
[\[54b.2\]]kyi dbang gis ni/_/de yang 'byung pos bzung sogs bzhin/_/nye ba'i rim pas gzhan bsad na/_/skad cig mar yang 'dod ma yin/_/'on kyang tshul 'dis gang du yang /_/gsad bya med cing gsod byed med/_/mi 'dod pa yi lus kyi mthus/_/drag shul spyod pa'i rnam rig ni/_/'jigs
[\[54b.3\]]pa'i don du 'di skyes te/_/dmyal ba rnams kyi 'ba' zhig bzhin/_/ji ltar snang ba de bzhin du/_/chos kyi rang bzhin gal te yin/_/yang dag don ni mthong ba'i phyir/_/'gro ba thams cad cis mi grol/_/de nyid kyi phyir 'khrul pa yin/_/'gro ba 'di la rang byung rnams/_/thugs rjes 'khrul pa
[\[54b.4\]]spang phyir yin/_/bdag nyid bde la don med 'gyur/_/glog dang 'brug dang char dag ni/_/sprin dang rlung dang gnam lcags ni/_/sems tsam yin las ma gtogs par/_/nam mkha'i dkyil du 'grub ma yin/_/gal te dngos po yod yin na/_/'ga' yang bdag nyid kyis grub na/_/'dod
[\[54b.5\]]pa'i dbye bas nges phye ba'i/_/'di dag du mar mthong mi 'gyur/_/'ga' zhig gzhon nu la chags shing /_/gzhan dag bud med bar ma la/_/kha cig tsho la gzhan dag ni/_/skem dang kha cig sngo bsangs la/_/gang tshe bud med rnam pa ni/_/sems nyid las skyes de yi tshe/_/ngo tsha dang bcas
[\[54b.6\]]'dod chen gyis/_/bdag nyid bdag la su zhig chags/_/'di dag thams cad blo ldan gyis/_/thams cad du ni rang dngos yin/_/yul gyis te bar longs spyod phyir/_/byis pa lta bur 'jug mi rigs/_/rang gi rmi lam gyis 'khrul phyir/_/lag pa yis ni lag bzung nas/_/
[\[54b.7\]]bdag gis rkun ma 'di zin ces/_/smra ba gzhan gyis spong bar byed/_/dud 'gro rtswa skam bza' bar sems/_/mi rnams bza' bar sems ma yin/_/rnam rtog 'jug pa ngo mtshar che/_/rnal 'byor pas kyang bsam mi khyab/_/ri dwags me mdag mi za zhing /_/dug gi byi ba dug
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]gis ni/_/srog ni mtha' ru byed pas kyang /_/de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ma yin/_/mas dran pa yis rgyud dang ni/_/reg dang gnyid dang rlung rnams kyis/_/nya dang bya dang khyi dang sbrul/_/sems can gzhan rnams 'tsho ba yin/_/sna tshogs las kyis dben pa
[\[55a.2\]]yi/_/sla k+Sha mthong na sbyin mo dang /_/gnod sbyin 'khor gyi skye tshogs kyis/_/rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar ro/_/yi dwags kyis chu rnag 'brub cing /_/bshang gci rnyog pa dang ldan snang /_/mi yis chu bo dri med par/_/mthong ba dang ni 'thung ba'ang yin/_/dge min dge ba'i
[\[55a.3\]]'bras rnam pa/_/las kyi bag chags kyis bsgos pas/_/rnam rig de dang de nyid ni/_/stong pa nyid kyi don la 'jug_/e ma'o yul ni sna tshogs pa/_/dus gcig la ni du ma ru/_/rtog pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yis/_/rol mo'i tshogs kyi sgra bzhin no/_/gal te don yod don
[\[55a.4\]]byed nyid/_/med na'ang de ru mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyis sgyur ldan se'u zos pas/_/gzhan gyi kha nas chu 'dzag 'gyur/_/mtshan mo 'bras bu za ba las/_/gzhan 'ga' zhig gis dris pa na/_/gal te se'u za zhes smras na/_/thos pas 'gyur ba min nam ci/_/rmi lam
[\[55a.5\]]mdzes ma dang 'phrad pa'i/_/bde ba thob la rgyu yod min/_/don med pa las khu ba ni/_/shor zhing 'byung ba min nam ci/_/rmi lam mthong ba 'di yod na/_/gal te goms pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin/_/gzhon nu ma sbrum bu skyes pa/_/mthong ba 'di ni rigs ldan min/_/khang
[\[55a.6\]]pa'i nang du yun ring dang /_/lam dang ri dang yul rnams ni/_/rnam pa tha dad mthong ba'i phyir/_/rmi lam mthong la don med do/_/rnam par rig pa'ang rnam rig gi_/don min gal te mi 'dod na/_/de tshe de yi grub pa'i mtha'/_/nges par rags pa'i gnas thob 'gyur/_/gzhan
[\[55a.7\]]gyi sems la sogs pa'i yul/_/rnal 'byor pa yis gang shes pa'ang /_/de yang shes pa kho na min/_/bdag nyid sems kyis mos pa bzhin/_/kun rdzob ldan shes thams cad la/_/mkhas pa dang ni gzhan dag gis/_/bzung ba dang ni ston pa ni/_/mtshungs pa kho nar rab tu
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]'jug_/stong nyid mthong ba'i dang po ru/_/snang ba kho nar 'bras chen yin/_/gang phyir 'jigs med thob pa ni/_/'jig rten gzhan bzhin 'jigs pa med/_/'chi ba dang ni skye ba nyid/_/sprul pa 'dra ba nyid du bzhed/_/bdag nyid gang yin de yis ni/_/de ltar 'jigs pa zhes
[\[55b.2\]]byar 'gyur/_/'di dag las kyi sprul nyid du/_/sa ni gsum po shes pa yang /_/gal te phyir yang 'jigs 'gyur na/_/kye ma bdag 'dra'i skye bo nyams/_/yan lag mchog ni gnyis pa dang /_/de bzhin mig ni gsum pa ste/_/bcad dang phyung bar dogs pa ni/_/de gnyis
[\[55b.3\]]med na gang las 'gyur/_/de ltas blo dang ldan pas yul 'di rnam par nges/_/lhag pa'i dri ma dang 'dres rnam par bsgoms pas kyang /_/dag pa'i phyir na nam yang dri ma ldan ma yin/_/sprin dum ma dag pa yis dri med nam mkha' bzhin/_/'dir ni mang smras ci zhig bya/_/gal te 'ga'
[\[55b.4\]]zhig gis bsgoms na/_/khyi dang ri bong rta mgor skyes/_/rwa yang mthong bar snang ba yin/_/sbal pa ral pa'i thod bcings shing /_/kha dog gsal ba'i thal bas byug_/tshangs pa'i skud pa dkar po thogs/_/phrag pa la ni spyi blugs bzhag_/khang pa mun pa dang bcas la/_/
[\[55b.5\]]'jigs pa de dang der brtags pas/_/rang sems nges par snang ba ni/_/byis pas gdon mthong min nam ci/_/shin tu 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin gzugs/_/rang gis bris nas bltas pa yin/_/dben pa ru ni gcig pu yang /_/ri mo mkhan 'jigs min nam ci/_/sdong
[\[55b.6\]]dum la ni rkun ma dang /_/thag pa la ni sbrul brtags pas/_/skye bo du ma glo bur du/_/'jigs pa thob pa ma yin nam/_/rang gi rtog pas bzo byas pa/_/bden nyid min pa'i yul rnams kyis/_/byis pa thams cad rnam bcom ste/_/bdag nyid kyi ni skyon las so/_/nyin
[\[55b.7\]]mtshan mtshungs pa'i long ba la'ang /_/nam langs zhes bya'i sgra thos nas/_/sngon gyi rdzas rnams mthong ba ni/_/snang bar bcas bzhin skye bar 'gyur/_/yul dus la sogs dngos po rnams/_/rmi lam 'khrul pa'i rnam shes la/_/lam ni thung ngu dag la yang /_/ring por
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]snang bas dub par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gang phyir 'dod ldan gyi/_/skyes bu 'dod ma dang bral na/_/chu tshod grangs mtshungs nyin mo yang /_/lo brgyad dag dang mtshungs par 'gyur/_/de nyid gzigs pa de rnams kyi/_/de lta'i tshul du der brtags nas/_/
[\[56a.2\]]tha snyad du ni mdzad na yang /_/bden no snyam du mi sems so/_/de ltar bstan pas sna tshogs 'di/_/rtog pa'i mtshon gyi rgyu las ni/_/thams cad ri mo 'drar mthong ste/_/ngo bo nyid kyi mthong ma yin/_/e ma'o bden min kun tu rtog pas thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba ru/_/sa gsum
[\[56a.3\]]po 'di bsdus pa bzhin du sems kyis nam mkha' dag khyab par/_/bris pa'i mnyam dang mi mnyam mtho dman 'gro ba ngo mtshar las ngo mtshar/_/bden no lta bur 'khrul pas rig par yang ni blo yis gzung bar bya/_/gal te dngos po dngos gyur na/_/slar yang dngos med 'gyur ba
[\[56a.4\]]ci/_/de bzhin nyid bstan rang bzhin phyir/_/rnam gzhan nyid du mi 'thad do/_/ming dang rigs sogs yon tan gyis/_/gang zhig chos rnams mthong gyur pa/_/phyin ci log gis bcom pa yis/_/mkha' khongs ri mo de byed do/_/de phyir sems kyi rang bzhin gyi/_/
[\[56a.5\]]chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/gang zhig rnam pa gzhan du rig_/de ni don dam rigs pa min/_/gal te rtog pa yod min la/_/gal te stong nyid yod na yang /_/gsal ba dang ni mi gsal ba/_/rang nyid 'bad pa med par 'gyur/_/mi shes na ni rtog mi nyams/_/
[\[56a.6\]]rtog pa nyams pa rtogs par byed/_/sgrib byed brtan pa'i rang bzhin can/_/stong pa nyid ni gsal mi 'gyur/_/'di dag dbye ba cung zad med/_/rtog pa med par 'gyur zhe na/_/gzhan dbang nyid kyis stong pa nyid/_/yang dag par ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'di la
[\[56a.7\]]yang dag zhugs/_/ngo bo nyid gsum mthong ba'i phyir/_/de mthong ba las chos kun la/_/ril por 'dzin pa ldog par 'gyur/_/gcig pu mthong mi tha dad pa/_/gsum gyi tshul du gsal bar mthong /_/bag chags kyis bsgribs nus pa las/_/de la brtags
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]pa bsal bar 'gyur/_/kun brtags rim gyis dman pa las/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni rab tu gsal/_/dang po las ni rab g.yos bzhin/_/rang bzhin ma mthong tshul gyis so/_/rim gyis de yi snang ba dang /_/bral na slar yang stong pa nyid/_/de nyid bstan par
[\[56b.2\]]byed pa bzhin/_/snying la gsal snang skye bar 'gyur/_/de yang glog bzhin mi brtan pa'i/_/skad cig la ni 'ong zhing 'gro/_/rnam kun thog ma med dus kyi/_/gnyis kyis de nyid bslad phyir ro/_/slar yang ji srid de dbus su/_/g.yo med ma gyur de srid du/_/gnyis dang
[\[56b.3\]]gnyis min go 'phang dag_/'char zhing nub pa nyid yin no/_/g.yo med gyur nas phyir yang ni/_/'od zer stong par shar ba bzhin/_/'gal phyir mun pa 'jug pa yis/_/gnas skabs thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnas skabs de yang 'di 'dra bar/_/shes min stong nyid du brjod
[\[56b.4\]]mod/_/'jig rten la grags med pa pa'i/_/don gyi rjes su ltung ba min/_/med pa nyid dang gzugs nyid do/_/'di ni tha snyad don dam du/_/dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la/_/yod dam med pa su yi yin/_/khyod kyis dran par mi bya zhes/_/smras na bkag pa 'di dran pa/_/ji
[\[56b.5\]]ltar de ltar yod min pa'i/_/sgra las gzhan ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog las don rnams shes/_/don gyi blo las rnam rtog kyang /_/gnyi ga rnam rtog chos yin phyir/_/yod pa gang yin med gang yin/_/rten ni gang zhig bsgoms pa yis/_/med pa yang ni yod par
[\[56b.6\]]'gyur/_/gal te de bzhin du 'dod pa/_/de bzhin yod pa nyid kyang thob/_/de bzhin yod dang med pa dang /_/bde sdug la sogs med par bzhed/_/ltos pas grub pa de thams cad/_/ring thung la sogs bye brag bzhin/_/skyes bu'i sdug bsngal zhi ba la/_/bde ba zhes byar rab tu
[\[56b.7\]]brtags/_/bde ba nyams pa sdug bsngal yin/_/gnyis po 'di ni ltos pas yin/_/ltos pa nyid las kun 'byung bar/_/'di dag thams cad shes par bya/_/gcig nyid la ni ma ltos par/_/gzhan dag khong du chud ma yin/_/gzhan sel ba yi rnam shes ni/_/spyod yul rnam
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]par ma dpyad par/_/bstan pa la sogs bsgrub pa yis/_/kha cig 'khrul pa yang dag bskyed/_/yi ge tshig dang ngag dang ni/_/rtags rnams dang ni tshig dang ni/_/bya ba byed pa'i 'brel pa dang /_/brdzun phyir rjod par byed ma yin/_/tshigs bcad tshig rkang lnga pa'am/_/gsum pa ru ni
[\[57a.2\]]ci mi 'dod/_/rjod byed brjod bya la ltos nas/_/mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig bzhin du 'gyur/_/chos rnams gzung bar bya ba yin/_/sngon gyi mkhas par rang 'dod pas/_/sgra rnams sbyar bas nyon mongs la/_/'jig rten pa dag ci phyir btsud/_/'di ni sna zhes brjod pa na/_/mgo
[\[57a.3\]]bo bskor bar gyur pa yi/_/lag ngar bkug pa'i lag pa yis/_/dris la su zhig ston par byed/_/sgra yi bdag nyid 'jig rten pa/_/bdag nyid gus par 'gyur ma yin/_/sgra 'don pa yi sbal tshogs dang /_/brag gi dkyil gyi gab tshe bzhin/_/gzhan gyis gzhan ni rig pa
[\[57a.4\]]ru/_/'brel pa med phyir mi rigs so/_/ral gri gzhan la brgyab pa yis/_/gzhan dag gcod par byed dam ci/_/ma byas pa yi dngos po ni/_/'ga' yis gang yang mthong ba med/_/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo yis/_/dngos po rab tu bskyed pa yin/_/dngos po dngos po'i
[\[57a.5\]]rang bzhin min/_/dngos po'i dus na dngos med phyir/_/de nyid phyir na 'das pa'i dngos/_/'byung ba zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/de nyid phyir na skyob pa yis/_/'byung ba zhes ni rab tu gsungs/_/'byung ba kun gyi 'byung mchog phyir/_/nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin/_/gcig
[\[57a.6\]]la brgya yi blo skye min/_/de bzhin brgya yi bar la'ang med/_/de bzhin du yang brgya brjod pa/_/sems ni 'khrul par gyur pa yin/_/mtho ris sogs pas bum pa'am/_/mthong ba'am ni ma mthong ba/_/de yi bdag nyid rtogs 'gyur na/_/tshig tu ston pas ci zhig bya/_/
[\[57a.7\]]glang po dang ni sa srung glang /_/bud med dang ni lha'i bud med/_/de las snga na med blo med/_/mthong ba las ni mchog tu skye/_/mthong ba gzhan min smra ba'ang gzhan/_/thos pa gzhan yin rtogs pa'ang gzhan/_/de ltar 'jig rten smyon pa bzhin/_/bdag nyid khong du chud ma yin/_/bdag
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]nyid smyon pa yin zhes pa/_/de ni ji ltar smyon yin 'gyur/_/yang dag rang shes smyon pa min/_/rnam par 'khrul pa smyon par brjod/_/yul sogs nges pa'i rnam par ni/_/'gro ba gsum po gang snang ba/_/de phyir de ni 'khrul ma yin/_/rnam par rig yin de yi phyir/_/glang po'i don
[\[57b.2\]]dang de'i rnam pa/_/de nyid dngos med mkhas pa yin/_/kun brtags la sogs rang bzhin rnams/_/rim pa bzhin du shes par bya/_/sgyu ma mkhan gyi sprul pa yis/_/glang po gcig pu kho na la/_/don stong don du snang ba dang /_/gzung ba'i dngos po brdzun don yin/_/de ltar yang dag
[\[57b.3\]]mthong bas sngar/_/don du 'dzin pa ldog par 'gyur/_/gzhan dbang de yi rnam pa ni/_/de yi sems las byung ba yin/_/rnam pa de yi rnyog pa yang /_/don gyi dngos po med mthong bas/_/bag chags spangs pa'i phyi nas ni/_/sa brgyad pa la ldog par 'gyur/_/sems kyi 'khor lo
[\[57b.4\]]nges log na/_/phyir yang 'khor bas 'khor mi 'gyur/_/yongs su grub pa'i chos yin phyir/_/'on kyang yang dag skye ba 'byung /_/ri mor bris bzhin g.yo ba med/_/rtog pa med cing 'dod pa med/_/de ni gnyis med spyod yul phyir/_/len dang 'dod pa cung zad med/_/smon lam
[\[57b.5\]]rnams kyi mthu yis ni/_/thog mtha' med pa'i srid gsum du/_/rtog pa med par 'jig rten gyi/_/mun pa sel byed nyi ma bzhin/_/de phyir byed pa po rnams dang /_/skyes bu'i las 'bras gang yin pa/_/de yi dge dang mi dge ba/_/skyob pas rtog pa'i ngo bor gsungs/_/chos dang
[\[57b.6\]]chos min dka' thub gtong /_/bsdams dang des bsdams dul ba dang /_/dud 'gro dmyal ba yi dwags dang /_/lha dang bcas pa'i mi rnams dang /_/'byung dang 'byung 'gyur phung po dang /_/khams dang thub pa'i bstan pa dang /_/ston pa dang ni nyan thos te/_/thams cad kun
[\[57b.7\]]rdzob yin par bstan/_/dang po'i las can 'jig rten pa/_/dam pa'i don la gzhug pa'i phyir/_/thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/skas kyi them pa lta bur gsungs/_/de ltar byis pas brjod pa rnams/_/mthar ni thams cad 'jig pa yin/_/brjod par bya min
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]dpyad du med/_/cung zad gzhan yang gsal ba yin/_/de la nam mkha' gsal ba 'dis/_/stong pa nyid ni gsal bar byed/_/bdag nyid dang ni stong pa nyid/_/cung zad gnas pa'i gnas pa med/_/ji skad ston pa'i lam 'di ni/_/cung zad kyang ni
[\[58a.2\]]mthong ba med/_/nyams shing zhi ba spangs pa yi/_/'jig rten ma lus bzhad gad bzhin/_/bdag nyid kyis ni sngon gyi rabs/_/de bzung ba yi ro gcig dngos/_/gang zhig sems par byed na yang /_/gdon mi za bar ngo mtshar 'gyur/_/gal te 'di kun stong nyid yin/_/dge
[\[58a.3\]]ba'i rtsom pa don med 'gyur/_/gang gi stong nyid don byas pa/_/bden te don la don med yin/_/de tshe sdig pa'i rtsom pa yang /_/de yis shin tu mi rigs so/_/gang tshe stong mthong rnal 'byor pas/_/chad pa stong bzhin 'ching ba med/_/rtog pa'i nang du lhung ba la/_/de dag thams cad
[\[58a.4\]]gzhan nyid 'gyur/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po yi/_/'khor ba'i 'bras des thob phyir ro/_/rmi lam na byas las rnams la/_/dge dang mi dge ci zhig yod/_/ma sad par yang 'bras mi myong /_/ma lus rmi lam nyid na yang /_/sad na med par shes pa'i phyir/_/rmi lam 'jug pa'i
[\[58a.5\]]'bras bu med/_/de phyir ye shes skyes pas na/_/thams cad kyi 'bras mtha' ru brdzun/_/rmi lam mgal me mig 'phrul ni/_/skye dang 'gag pa tha dad med/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni/_/gang gis thams cad yang dag mthong /_/nyi ma gzhan la yul myong dang /_/gang zhig rmi
[\[58a.6\]]lam nges sad dang /_/rang bzhin nyams su myong ba ni/_/de dag bye brag gang yin smos/_/gang dang gang ni rten cing 'byung /_/de dang de yi rang bzhin zhi/_/sgyu ma'i yan lag tshogs pa yis/_/sgyu ma mkhan gyis ston pa bzhin/_/rnam pa du ma tha dad pa/_/gos 'dra ba yi dngos po rnams/_/
[\[58a.7\]]stong nyid me yis bsregs pa na/_/thal bar bye brag 'ga' yang med/_/snod dang sems can zhes bya ba'i/_/'jig rten gnyis ka bsregs nas ni/_/bdag nyid de yang de nyid du/_/me lce bzhin du bsregs pa yin/_/stong nyid me yis nges bsregs par/_/de ltar 'gro ba gsum mthong
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]bas/_/'khor ba ru ni gnas pa na/_/'ga' la'ang chags min rnal 'byor pa/_/gang tshe stong nyid la gnas pas/_/rab tu spyod min spyod pa'ang min/_/spyod pa ma yin spyod yul min/_/de tshe de la phra mor 'byung /_/stong nyid la gnas phyin chad ni/_/bud shing bzhin du thams cad spong /_/
[\[58b.2\]]me bzhin yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/de ni lhag ma med par 'gyur/_/de ltar gyur pa thogs pa med/_/gos med chags pa yod ma yin/_/phyir yang du ba 'byung ba med/_/rnal 'byor rig pas yang 'bar med/_/'bar ba med pa zhi ba thob/_/zhi bas kyang ni nyer zhi nyid/_/nye bar zhi
[\[58b.3\]]bas rab zhi nyid/_/rab tu zhi bas yang bsil nyid/_/bsil bar gyur pas gdung med nyid/_/gdung ba med pas rims med brjod/_/rims med pa yis rdul med dag_/gnyis med gnod pa med pa yin/_/bdag gi med pas rang 'dzin med/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag brgal/_/
[\[58b.4\]]phyir yang skye ba len mi byed/_/skye med de la 'chi ba'ang med/_/skye dang 'chi ba spangs pa yis/_/bdud rtsi'i go 'phang nyams su myong /_/tshul de thob nas phyir yang ni/_/thob par bya ba dmigs pa med/_/'khor bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis rgyu bde bas kyang /_/
[\[58b.5\]]'dod chags zhe sdang 'chang ma yin/_/thams cad du ni btang snyoms spyod/_/ltos dang bcas pa thams cad 'jig_/ltos med rtag tu 'jig pa med/_/'jig pa med pas mi 'gyur thob/_/'jig med 'gyur ba med par bzhugs/_/'jig pa med pa'i gnas thob pa/_/
[\[58b.6\]]gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin no/_/mya ngan 'das pa'am 'khor ba la/_/dbang thob khyab bdag dbang bsgyur phyir/_/de dbang de thub de ston yin/_/bya ba byas te de bzhin gshegs/_/bde bar gshegs te'ang gang yin pa/_/ye shes dbang phyug rnam 'phrul ba'o/_/yul
[\[58b.7\]]la shin tu chags pa ni/_/byis pa'i sems ni ma sbyangs pas/_/stong nyid bstan pa thos pa yis/_/snying ni gnyis su 'gas par 'gyur/_/rgya che ba yi chos thos dang /_/bshes gnyen bzang po bsten pa dang /_/rigs ldan 'bar bar byed pa ni/_/'di la 'jug par
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]'gyur ba yin/_/rtag tu brtson dang sbyor ldan pa/_/lam 'di la ni rjes zhugs pas/_/ring por mi thogs chos rnams kun/_/bdag med pa ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/chos 'di yongs su ma bsgoms pas/_/chos nyid thob par mi 'gyur te/_/chu ni thos
[\[59a.2\]]dang mthong ba yis/_/ma 'thungs skom pa ji ltar bzlog_/tshul gnas thos dang shes rab ldan/_/bsod nams tshogs ni yang dag bsags/_/yul rnams la ni dug bzhin blta/_/lus dang srog la chags pa med/_/khyim mam yang na nags su ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[59a.3\]]mnyam gzhag ste/_/dang por bdag med lam gyis ni/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang la 'jug pas/_/'jig rten don ni gtso bor byas/_/rang don zhar mdzad thugs rje'i bdag_/'jig rten nyid dang chos rnams ni/_/rang bzhin gsum gyi ngo bo nyid/_/skad cig tsam yang skabs ldan na/_/
[\[59a.4\]]khyim par gyur pa yin yang bsgom/_/skyil mo krung ni bcas nas su/_/sna rtser g.yo ba'i yid bsdus la/_/longs spyod nyid ni nyer gnas pa/_/brdzun dang slu bar byed pa yin/_/ji ltar snang ba'i rang gi sems/_/dmigs pa mdun du byas nas ni/_/'dod chags gnas la chags mi
[\[59a.5\]]bya/_/nyes dang ldan la sdang mi bya/_/gti mug bcas pas rmongs mi bya/_/mkhas pas dmigs par mi bya'o/_/chags pa'i gnas la chags byed dang /_/zhe sdang can la sdang bas gnod/_/nyon mongs shin tu 'phel ba'i phyir/_/rmongs pa gti mug gis ni nyams/_/ting nge
[\[59a.6\]]'dzin ni mi brtan phyir/_/rnam par rtog pas nyams byas nas/_/nyams pa'i sgo ni de dang des/_/gzhan dag nyid ni rab tu rtog_/rmongs pa'ang 'du shes rmongs pa'i phyir/_/rmongs pa'i dngos po sems dpa' yin/_/shin tu mun nag smag tu lhung /_/'khrul pa yis ni long
[\[59a.7\]]ba bzhin/_/mkhas pas dmigs pa'i gnas la ni/_/bzlog pa ru ni yid la bya/_/nyon mongs cung zad goms pa yis/_/me la snum gyis bzhin du 'phel/_/de nas sbyor ba byas pa yis/_/g.yul ngo ru ni dpa' bo bzhin/_/'dod chags la sogs pa yi gnas/_/dpa'
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ba'i dgra la bsnun par bya/_/ma lus pa ni gzigs pa yis/_/nyon mongs de nyid sgrib par gsungs/_/de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/de dag nyid ni spang bar bya/_/rtags sogs bdag nyid ma lus pa/_/de dag gsum du dmigs par bya/_/don 'dzin don du nges snang dang /_/
[\[59b.2\]]don rnams stong pa nyid bstan pa/_/bsams pa yis ni shes rab kyis/_/dbye ba nges par yang bsam bya/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/_/bsam gyis mi khyab bsam par bya/_/gang snang de ni de nyid min/_/gang zhig ma mthong de de bzhin/_/dngos por rtog pa nyid kyis long /_/
[\[59b.3\]]rab rib kyis ni 'khrul pa bzhin/_/bdag gis cung zad mthong bden min/_/kun tu brtags pa 'khrul pa tsam/_/rgyu mtshan med pa'i mtshan mar yang /_/yun ring gnas ni mtshan mas bcom/_/kye ma 'jig rten pa yi mig_/brdzun pa'i dbang gis 'khrul pa yin/_/ri yi rtse
[\[59b.4\]]mo'i skra mthong zhing /_/rags pa'i ri bo mthong ma yin/_/skra nyag mu tig la phog pa/_/'gro na 'phong rkyen gang yin pa/_/mtshan ma la phog khyad 'phags par/_/rkyen te gnyis po rkyen ma yin/_/don du lta la thams cad kun brtags kho na'i don ni shin tu gsal bar snang /_/rlung
[\[59b.5\]]gis bskyod pas gar mkhan lta bu'i dpa' tshogs 'dra ba'i ri dgas chu bzhin no/_/rdzing bu la sogs chu ni nye bar de bzhin bden par rigs min snyam/_/yang dag ma yin brtags par lhung bzhin 'bad med phal cher yang dag 'dzin ma yin/_/sems kyis med pa 'di sems pa/_/rgyu mtshan
[\[59b.6\]]rmi lam 'jug pa bzhin/_/kun brtags med pas gzhan gyi dbang /_/de na sems kyis thob pa yin/_/nyon mongs med pa'i rang bzhin snang /_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i sa dang nye/_/yongs su rdzogs pa gang thob pa/_/rnam par mi rtog pa la gnas/_/yang de mthong ba'i blo ldan gyis/_/
[\[59b.7\]]gzhan gyi dngos la 'jug ma yin/_/kun brtags bdag nyid med pa'i phyir/_/de nyid shin tu bsgom ma yin/_/brdzun par bdag nyid mthong bas yang /_/gal te 'di de de dag nyid/_/bdag nyid myur du mthong na ni/_/de tshe rmi lam bzhin du bsam/_/rmi lam lta bur nges shes na/_/
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]phyi nas brdzun pa'i bdag nyid ni/_/skad cig gcig la snang ma yin/_/gnyen po yis ni bkag phyir ro/_/snying po de lta bu 'dzin pa/_/med pa'i mtha' la gal te reg_/de bzhin nyid la shin tu dmigs/_/gal te de nyid dmigs gyur na/_/de ni spang ba'i don phyir
[\[60a.2\]]yang /_/stong nyid shin tu dmigs par bya/_/sna tshogs lta kun spang ba'i phyir/_/spong ba'i stong nyid bstan pa yin/_/rdo rje sbyin gyis byugs pa yi/_/khang pa'i sgo la lha min bzhin/_/rnam rig la 'jug rnal 'byor pas/_/phyogs gnyis yang dag reg ma yin/_/de gnyis dbus su bag
[\[60a.3\]]med pas/_/gzhan 'ga' zhig gis reg gyur na/_/rdo rje sbyin gyis bzung nas ni/_/de yi lus ni bsreg par 'gyur/_/snang ba thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas/_/de yi rtags kyang shes bya ste/_/dngos grub med na mi 'byung ste/_/du ba sol ba dngos po bzhin/_/kun tu brtags pa spang ba
[\[60a.4\]]des/_/mi gsal ba yi ri mo bzhin/_/bsam gtan las ni langs pa yis/_/'gro ba thams cad mi gsal snang /_/zad dang rnying pa lta bu dang /_/kun tu zhib pa lta bu dang /_/grong stong lta bur dben pa dang /_/dga' ba med cing rten med pa/_/shin tu skyo skye 'gro ba la/_/tsi ri sgra 'don pa
[\[60a.5\]]la bzhin/_/bdag dang bdag gi med pa dang /_/ming tsam 'ba' zhig kho na'o/_/gzhan dbang zhes bya mthong bas kyang /_/rang bzhin 'di lta bu ru snang /_/rang sems shing rta la zhon dang /_/bdag gis snang du zhugs lta bur/_/mig 'phrul 'byung ba lta bu ste/_/de nyid kho na 'khrul
[\[60a.6\]]pa tsam/_/ma lus mun pas khyab pa bzhin/_/de la kun brtags stong ma yin/_/bag chags lhag ma'i ri mo yis/_/thams cad bris pa lta bu ru/_/nyon mongs nyid kyis khyab pa dang /_/'khor lo lta bur 'khor ba dang /_/rmi lam gsal sad shes pa dang /_/mtshan dang mtshan nyid
[\[60a.7\]]med par snang /_/mthong nas mi snang dang mtshungs par/_/ci zhig lta bur snang ba yin/_/yongs su grub pa shes pa ni/_/thams cad ro gcig bdag nyid de/_/cha shas med cing thog mtha' med/_/rnam pa med cing gzung du med/_/skyo med 'tshe ba yod ma yin/_/ring po ma yin zlum
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]por min/_/nyi mas mun pa bsal ba yi/_/nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med/_/mnyam nyid chos ni rtogs pa'i phyir/_/thams cad mi mnyam pa dang mnyam/_/kun rdzob tu ni chos 'di snang /_/dam pa'i don du snang ma yin/_/rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyi rgyu'i/_/rnam rtog kun rdzob ces byar
[\[60b.2\]]brjod/_/rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa ni/_/de nyid kho na dam pa'i don/_/ji ltar ming gis bstan de yang /_/kun rdzob nyid du gnas pa yin/_/dam pa'i don ni de bzhin te/_/de bzhin tshig gis de yul min/_/rig la gnas pa ma yin pas/_/de phyir de 'jigs thub pa yis/_/stong nyid bdag
[\[60b.3\]]nyid gsungs shing gsungs/_/tha dad pa yi chos rnams bstan/_/yun ring 'phel ba'i rnam rtog la/_/byis pa rnams ni dga' ba nyid/_/spros la sems ni chags pas na/_/de lta na ni 'di 'phel lo/_/mtshan ma 'god pa'i don la ni/_/sems 'di yang ni mkhas pa yis/_/rnam rtog
[\[60b.4\]]bye brag zhi ma yin/_/mi 'gyur ba ni gang du'ang med/_/bdag med pA la sems dmigs pa/_/btang snyoms 'dra ba thob pa dang /_/gnyid log lta bur 'dod pa med/_/dub pa brtags pa lta bu dang /_/stong nyid stong par mthong ba yis/_/mig ni 'dzum par byed ma yin/_/
[\[60b.5\]]mgo 'phang mthon po ma yin dang /_/sems dang sems byung 'gag par 'gyur/_/rtags ni 'di dag mthong nas kyang /_/bdag gis don byas 'di nyid mthong /_/dpa' bos bsgom pa 'dor ma yin/_/mchog las kyang ni mchog yod phyir/_/de yang 'di zhes 'ga' yis kyang /_/
[\[60b.6\]]de nyid bstan par nus ma yin/_/'di ni goms byas rnal 'byor pas/_/bdag nyid kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/rnam par rig tsam nyid mthong na/_/de ni mtha' gnyis dbus la gnas/_/'gro ba ma lus 'di dag la/_/de nyid phun sum tshogs pa ston/_/de nyid phun sum
[\[60b.7\]]tshogs gnas phyir/_/snying rje ldan pa bde gshegs sras/_/srog gis kyang ni sems can don/_/byed la btang snyoms 'jog ma yin/_/yul rnams 'ga' yang sems pa med/_/rmi lam 'jug pa bzhin du brten/_/bu dang bu mo la sogs pa'i/_/gzhan gyi nye bar longs spyod
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]kyang /_/bag med gnas ni rgya che bas/_/sems ni rnam par 'gyur ma yin/_/'byor pa dang ni rgud pa la/_/thams cad du ni sems mnyam nyid/_/dus ma yin pa'i sprin bzhin yang /_/ga la'i mkha' las sprin ldang ba/_/bdag nyid kyis ni de dang de/_/ngo
[\[61a.2\]]mtshar rnam par 'phrul pa ston/_/dus rnams shes par dus gcig la/_/'bar ba dang ni char 'bab byed/_/sa la yang ni chu bzhin du/_/byi zul du ni byed pa'ang yin/_/ri la sogs pa g.yo ba dang /_/'byed dang sdud pa de bzhin no/_/bdag nyid nam mkha' la 'gro zhing /_/chu la
[\[61a.3\]]ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin/_/sprul pa yis kyang ring po nas/_/mthong dang thos byed de bzhin no/_/theg chen tshul la thams cad du/_/rigs kyi 'di ni gzhan la min/_/de las gzhan pa'i phyi rol pa/_/gang zhig cung zad mthong ba ni/_/rang gi ro las 'ongs pa ste/_/de nyid kyis ni lam
[\[61a.4\]]'di la/_/cung zad cig kyang mthong ba med/_/thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad gzigs/_/rnam pa tha dad brtags pa yang /_/de nyid phyir na dngos gcig nyid/_/stong nyid don gcig mthong ba yis/_/'gro kun don ni gcig tu mthong /_/phyogs gcig gi ni chu 'thungs pas/_/
[\[61a.5\]]rgya mtsho ma lus shes par 'gyur/_/dus gcig la ni tha dad pa/_/yul la sogs pa tha dad la/_/stong par mthong ba ma gtogs par/_/skyob pa'i ye shes 'khrung ma yin/_/rang sems kyis ni kun brtags bris/_/phyi rol gsal ba'i dbyibs su gnas/_/skye ba du ma goms
[\[61a.6\]]pas gsal/_/srid gsum ri mo'i bye brag bzhin/_/kun brtags de yi spros mkhyen pa'i/_/skyob pas 'di dag thams cad gzigs/_/dngos med mtshan med zad pa med/_/kun tu brtags pa 'ba' zhig go/_/'di bsgoms tshul gyis 'dod chags thul/_/rim gyis bde
[\[61a.7\]]spyod 'dod pa med/_/thub dbang 'dod pa ma spangs pas/_/gnas mchog gzhan gyi don ldan thob/_/bde gshegs kyis gsungs dbye ba rab grags pa/_/don chen rnam gsal tshig gis rab sbyar bas/_/log pa'i lam zhugs mi shes mun sel bya/_/snang ba'i phreng ba 'di
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ni bdag gis sbyar/_/dngos por 'dzin pa spong byed yul gyi thob pa'i zhen pa gcod/_/sems la snang ba 'phel byed sgron me chen po gsal 'bar bzhin/_/ye shes snang skyes de nyid yang thob rang gi lag na gnas pa bzhin/_/shes rab pha rol phyin 'di rgyud gnas kun tu yid
[\[61b.2\]]bzhin nor/_/kun rdzob sgro btags gsungs la phyi rol pa/_/nges pa'i don du zhen pas bde gshegs nyid/_/gang zhig phyi rol don 'dod de mdun du/_/slob dpon chang ba bde gshegs phyed mi mdzad/_/gang tshe 'jigs pa med pa'i byang chub mngon thob pas/_/khyod kyis kyang ni yi ges
[\[61b.3\]]yi ge gsum mi mnga'/_/de tshe yun rings nas nyams lcags kyu med pa yis/_/phyin ci log la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed/_/sangs rgyas pa dang phyi rol rnam par 'byed byed pa/_/gal te stong nyid gcig pu 'di ni ma bstan par/_/zhib mo'i blo yis rnam par dpyad byas na/_/
[\[61b.4\]]grub mtha' thams cad mtshungs par 'gyur ba yin/_/gal te stong min rtag cing mnyam nyid ma yin na/_/tha dad bdag nyid rgyu mtshan skad cig ma dag tu/_/thams cad mkhyen pas dngos po yongs dpyad pas/_/gang gi rgyu yis ston par grub
[\[61b.5\]]par gyur/_/gang zhig rnal 'byor pa yi dngos grub khyad 'phags rgyu/_/gzhan sems spyod yul shes pa'i nga rgyal yin/_/de dag bun pa'i dri ma lhag pa yin par 'dod/_/'ching ba'i bdag nyid byis la ji ltar gnas pa bzhin/_/gang zhig kun tu dmus long dang ni rab rib
[\[61b.6\]]can/_/gnyis po dag las snga ma bzhin du mchog yin te/_/bdag ni long ba yin zhes nga rgyal gyis stong gi_/rab rib kyis mthong 'bras bu med la nga rgyal min/_/gang zhig rang skyon skyon gyi ngo bor mi shes pa/_/de bzhin yon tan kun las yon tan du ma yin/_/dge ba'i bshes
[\[61b.7\]]gnyen rnams la gus par byed ma yin/_/de dag de nyid ro ni ji ltar 'thung bar 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i dkyil la ri mo byed pa la mkhas pa/_/dngos po'i bye brag ston pa'i brtson 'grus can/_/kye ma thog mar spros pa thob pa'i 'chad pa pos/_/skye bo gzhan la sna tshogs bstan pas spros
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pa bskyed/_/chu nang sprul zhugs rjes ni mthong ba dang /_/nam mkha'i me tog phreng bas rab tu rgyan byed dang /_/rgyu spun med pa'i snam bu 'thag par byed pa ni/_/'jig rten rnams la ji ltar ngo tsha mi shes 'gyur/_/sun 'byin 'dod pas kyang ni ngag gcig 'dzin byed
[\[62a.2\]]pa/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung la de gus min mod kyi/_/shin tu mngar ba myangs nas kha ba'i ro bzhin du/_/gzhan gyis smras pa'i tshig la rjes su chags ma yin/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i bud med 'dod pa dang /_/gsal ba'i rigs rgyud dbang phyug khyim 'dod pas/_/glang po'i khyu yi
[\[62a.3\]]gtso bo spangs nas ni/_/dman pa'i bzhon pa bong bus su zhig 'gro/_/snang ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba slob dpon kam+pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku mA ra ka la sha dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus
[\[62a.4\]]pa'o//[ {D3896}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A lo ka mA la hr-i dA nan+da dza na nI TI ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_snang ba'i phreng ba'i 'grel pa yid dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gsung gi mchog
[\[62a.5\]]tu sad mdzad pa/_/gzigs dbang mgon la phyag 'tshal nas/_/snang ba'i phreng ba gsal ba yi/_/don ni rnam par nges par bya/_/mi shes gsum ni spang ba'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rab tu byed pa 'di'i 'brel pa dang /_brjod par bya ba dang /_dgos pa dang /_
[\[62a.6\]]dgos pa'i dgos pa rnams bstan te/_gang gi phyir 'brel pa la sogs pa ma bstan na rtog pa sngon du gtong ba rnams thos pa la sogs pa la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro/_/'dir sems tsam nyid du rab tu byed pa 'dis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de ni brjod par bya ba yin no/_/mi shes pa
[\[62a.7\]]gsum spangs pa ni dgos pa yin no/_/mi shes pa gsum spangs nas gdul bya rnams sangs rgyas nyid thob pa ni dgos pa'i dgos pa yin no/_/sems tsam nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba yin la/_rab tu byed pa ni thabs yin pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa dang brjod par bya ba thabs dang thabs
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]las byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel ba yin no zhes bya bar gnas so/_/de dag ni re zhig bsdus pa'i don to/_/yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/_gang gis sems tsam du gsungs pa/_/thub dbang de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes bya ba ni thugs su chud pas na thub pa ste/_
[\[62b.2\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa ste/_de rnams kyi dbang po ni thub dbang ste/_thub pa'i mchog rje btsun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sems tsam ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na/_smras pa/_rang bzhin gsum ni bsgoms pa yis/_/
[\[62b.3\]]zhes bya ba smos te/_kun brtags dang /_gzhan dbang dang /_yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gsum mo/_/rang bzhin gsum gyi ngo bo gang bsgoms pa de gsum gyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo ni sems tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ci'i phyir/_rang bzhin gsum gyi ngo bo sgom zhe na/_/
[\[62b.4\]]mi shes gsum ni spang ba'i phyir/_/zhes bya ba smos te/_kun brtags dang /_gzhan dbang dang /_yongs su grub pa'i yul la gang mi shes pa byis pa rnams la yod pa de spang ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ltar gang dag kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin gzugs la sogs pa rnams la
[\[62b.5\]]de kho na nyid du mngon par zhen pa de dag ni kun brtags pa'i yul mi shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gang dag 'du byed kyi bag chags kyi rgyu las skye ba'i sems la yang rgyu med pa nyid du 'dod pa de dag ni gzhan gyi dbang gi yul mi shes pa yin no/_/de bzhin du gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo
[\[62b.6\]]med pa la gang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bor sgro 'dogs par byed pa de dag ni yongs su grub pa'i yul mi shes pa yin no/_/mi shes pa gsum po de yang mdo gzhan dag las bcom ldan 'das kyis dgag pa mdzad do/_/de ltar yang /_blo yis rnam par gzhig na ni/_/gzhan dbang
[\[62b.7\]]med cing kun brtags med/_/yongs su grub pa'ang yod min ni/_/ji ltar blo yis rnam par brtag_/ces gsungs so/_/chos can bkag pa nyid kyis chos rnams bkag pa yin te/_de yang slob dpon gyis yang gzhung de'i rjes su 'brang nas don de nyid rab tu byed pa 'dis
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]gtan la phab ste/_'di ltar/_ming dang rigs stsogs yon tan no/_/chos rnams brdzun pa gang mthong ba/_/mkha' la ri mo 'dri ba ltar/_/phyin ci log gis dub pa yin/_/zhes bya ba des ni kun brtags pa'i yul mi shes pa spong ba yin no/_/'di
[\[63a.2\]]skad du/_kha las sgra ni ci phyir dang /_/rdza rnga las ni yang 'byung ba/_/tha dad pa yi rgyu 'di las/_/dngos po dngos po med par snang /_/zhes bya ba 'dis ni gzhan dbang gi yul la mi shes pa spong ba yin no/_/'di ltar/_'dir ni phyi nang cung zad med/_/phan tshun ltos pas grub pa'i
[\[63a.3\]]phyir/_/bar na ma yin med min te/_/sems tsam du ni gnas phyir ro/_/zhes bya ba 'dis yongs su grub pa'i yul mi shes pa spong ba yin no/_/de bas na 'di ltar sems tsam du gsungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das nyi ma lta bus mun pa'i tshogs lta bu'i mi shes pa gsum ma lus pa ring du spangs
[\[63a.4\]]pas 'gro ba rnams nges par legs pa thob par mdzad par gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/sems tsam nyid gcig pu yin na ji ltar rang bzhin gsum gyi ngo bo'i tha snyad du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes zer na/_de ltar yang ma yin te/_gang gi phyir bum pa gcig rim pa bzhin ldog
[\[63a.5\]]pa'i dbye bas yod pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_byas pa zhes bya bar bstan to/_/de bzhin du sems tsam la ngo bo gsum yin te/_'di ltar sems gnyis su med pa las ldog pa yang 'khrul pa'i bag chags rjes su 'brel ba'i kun brtags bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa phyi'i don
[\[63a.6\]]nyid du snang ngo /_/gzhan yang ma yin pa'i don las ldog pa las gzhan dbang gi ngo bo nyid de bzhin no/_/gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i ngo bo yongs su ma grub pa las ldog pa de kho na nyid khong du chud pas yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gsal ba yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/mi shes pa
[\[63a.7\]]gsum spangs pas kun brtags la sogs pa med par shes pa ni ma yin te/_gos kyi dri ma bkrus pa ni dri ma med pas gos med par rtogs pa yin pa ma yin nam/_de'i phyir yang kun brtags pa'i ngo bo yod par 'gyur ro zhe na/_de snyam du dgongs nas slob dpon gyis/_srid gsum mtha'
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]ru zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_'di ltar kun brtags la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni spros pa'o/_/srid gsum mtha' ru byon ni 'dod pa dang /_/gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i srid pa gsum po de dag mthar mdzad pas na srid gsum mtha' ru byon no/_/srid pa gsum
