[\[314b.2\]]nags su'o/_/bcu gcig pa rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/bcu gnyis pa bai rany+dza'i grong du'o/_/bcu gsum pa mchod rten gyi ri la'o/_/bcu bzhi pa rgyal po dze ta ba na'i lha khang du'o/_/bco lnga pa ka pi la ba tu ru shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar ro/_/bcu drug pa a Da ba kar ro/_/bcu bdun pa rgyal po'i khab
[\[314b.3\]]tu'o/_/bco brgyad pa dz+wa li ni'i brag phug tu'o/_/yang bcu dgu pa dz+wa li ni'i brag phug tu'o/_/nyi shu pa rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/dbyar gnas bzhi ni mnyan yod du shar phyogs ma mo mr-i gA ri'i kun dga' ra ba ru'o/_/grong khyer mnyan yod du lo nyi shu nyer gcig dbyar gnas mdzad do zhes pa 'phags pa gnas brtan
[\[314b.4\]]pa 'dod do/_/des na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni lo brgyad cur gyur to zhes so/_/paN+Di ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las gsung rab rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u sum cu gsum pa'o//_//
[\[314b.5\]]mkhas pa rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa 'di gsum nyid yid la byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung du dga' ba dang gus pa drag po bskyed par nus so/_/'di lta ste/_rgyu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /_phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa
[\[314b.6\]]pa'o/_/de la rgyu phun sum tshogs pa la bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_bsod nams ye shes tshogs goms pa dang /_dus ring du goms pa dang /_bar chad med par goms pa dang /_dam par byas te goms pa'o/_/'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_ye shes phun sum tshogs
[\[314b.7\]]pa dang /_spong pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_nus pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzugs sku phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/gzhan la phan 'dogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnams kyi dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu ches nges par grol ba'i phun sum tshogs pa
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]dang /_dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal shin tu ches nges par grol ba'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yi dgas sdug bsngal shin tu ches grol ba'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu ches grol ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/yang na sems can rnams nyan thos theg pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phun
[\[315a.2\]]sum tshogs pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas theg pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde 'gro la rab tu 'jog pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/de la ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_
[\[315a.3\]]nye bar bstan pa ma yin pa'i ye shes dang /_thams cad shes pa dang /_dus dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_'bad pa med par shes pa'o/_/spong ba phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_shin tu ches spangs pa dang /_bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa
[\[315a.4\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs pa'o/_/nus pa phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_phyi rol yul sprul pa yongs su bsgyur ba byin rlabs dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sku tshe ches ring ba byin rlabs dbang du gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[315a.5\]]nam mkha' sgrib pa ring ba myur du bgrod pa chung ngu mang po nyid phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rang nyid ngo mtshar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/gzugs sku phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_mtshan bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sred med kyi
[\[315a.6\]]bu'i stobs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_rdo rje snying po btus pa gdung phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chen po mdor bsdus pa ste/_de dbye ba byas na rab tu dbye ba mtha' med par 'gyur te/_de yang gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid bskal pa grangs med pa du mar 'tsho bar byin gyis brlabs nas thams
[\[315a.7\]]cad shes pa dang smra bar nus pa'o/_/de bzhin du re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni rmad du byung ba yon tan ye shes nus pa phan 'dogs pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas so/_/de lta na yang byis pa rnams rang yon tan gyi dbul bas lhag par mos pa nyams pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i de 'dra ba'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thos kyang
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]sangs rgyas dang de'i chos la gus par byed do/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi yang rkang mar gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de'i chos la mngon par khas len cing 'jug par byed do/_/de ltar yang de dag dad pa tsam gyis kyang mtha' gcig tu mngon par rab tu dang bas rnam par smin pa nges pa'i sdig pa'i las kyi phung po rnams zil
[\[315b.2\]]gyis mnan nas lha dang mi'i dpal phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas mya ngan las 'das par yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams zhing bla na med pa zhes brjod do/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod nams bskyed pa mo gsham ma yin pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur te/_
[\[315b.3\]]'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i 'bras bu dang /_'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_'bras bu myur ba dang /_thar pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_gang zhig rgyal ba rnam 'dren la/_/mchod pa chung ba'ang byed 'gyur ba/_/bde 'gro sna tshogs bgrod nas ni/_/bdud rtsi go 'phang
[\[315b.4\]]thob par 'gyur/_/zhes so/_/'di ni re zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan gzhan nyan thos dang thun mong ba yod do/_/kha cig so so skye bo dang thun mong ba'o/_/de yang ci ltar rigs par nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon lam dang ye shes dang /_so sor yang dag par rig pa dang
[\[315b.5\]]mngon par shes pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_zil gyis gnon pa dang /_skye mched dang zad par skye mched la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan gyi slob ma dang thun mong /_/chos 'ga' so so skye bo ste/_/nyon mongs med smon lam ye shes/_/so sor rig pa'i yon
[\[315b.6\]]tan sogs/_/zhes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis ni ma yin te/_'di lta ste/_dbu'i gtsug tor mi mngon pa dang 'od 'dom gang ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnas te mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur to/_/de ltar yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo las gsungs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das
[\[315b.7\]]bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bzhi pa las bzhengs
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de las bzhengs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la'o/_/de las bzhengs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la'o/_/de las bzhengs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la'o/_/de las bzhengs nas 'du shes tshor ba 'gog
[\[316a.2\]]pa la'o/_/de las bzhengs nas 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de las bzhengs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la'o/_/de nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la/_/de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la/_/de nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la/_/de nas bsam gtan gsum pa la/_/de nas bsam
[\[316a.3\]]gtan gnyis pa la/_/de nas bsam gtan dang po la/_de nas gnyis pa la/_de nas gsum pa la/_bsam gtan gsum pa bzhengs nas/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnas te de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su
[\[316a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das nas de ma thag tu sa chen po g.yo bar gyur pa la sogs pa rgyas par ro/_/paN+Di ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las rgyu 'bras gzhan la phan 'dogs pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o//_//da ni 'dus
[\[316a.5\]]ma byas brjod par bya ste/_'dus ma byas de ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'di lta ste/_nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa dang /_so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/de skad du yang /_'dus ma byas kyang rnam gsum ste/_/nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/_/zhes so/_/de la nam mkha' ni sgrib gegs med pa'i
[\[316a.6\]]rang bzhin te/_gang du gzugs kyi bgrod pa'o/_/yang /_de la sgrib med nam mkha' ste/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang /_bu ga nam mkha'i khams su brjod/_/zhes so/_/gang zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang bral ba de ni so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/so sor brtags pa ni shes rab bye brag ste/_/sdug bsngal la sogs pa
[\[316a.7\]]'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor spyod pa'o/_/so sor brtags pas thob pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/thob pa'i sgra phyis pas so/_/'di lta ste/_ba lang dang ldan pa'i shing rta la ba lang shing rta zhes so/_/so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa ni/_/bral ba rnams gang gzhan dang gzhan/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang ci zab pa dang bcas pa'i
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]chos rnams kyi so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa gcig nyid ce na ma yin te gsungs pa/_ldan pa'i rdzas rnams ci snyed pa/_/bral ba'i rdzas rnams de snyed do/_/gzhan du na sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs thams cad kyi 'gog pa dngos su mngon du byas par thal bas so/_/de ltar yin na'ang lhag ma
[\[316b.2\]]gnyen po bsgoms pa don med par 'gyur ro/_/gang mdo las gsungs pa/_skal ba mi mthun 'gog pa ni/_/zhes pa 'di'i don ci zhen brjod par bya ste/_'di'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu 'ga' zhig gis ni yod pa ma yin no/_/'dir gang kha cig gis ni ma yin no zhes pa 'di ni ngag 'di'i don yin no/_/'di'i skal ba
[\[316b.3\]]mnyam pa 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no/_/so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa bshad zin to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams skye ba'i shin tu gegs su gyur pas bral ba las 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni so sor ma brtags pa'i 'gog pa'o/_/'dir so sor brtags pas thob par bya ba ni ma yin no/_/'on kyang ni rkyen ma
[\[316b.4\]]tshang ba las so/_/yang /_'gog gzhan so sor ma brtags pas/_/skye ba shin tu gegs gyur pa/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'dus ma byas de gsum ni rtag pa ste/_/de skad du/_nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis/_/'dus ma byas gsum rtag pa nyid/_/ces so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la ni/_/chos thams cad kyi chos nyid
[\[316b.5\]]de bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin dngos po rang bzhin ngo bo rnam pa gzhan du ma yin pa'am de bzhin nyid de/_de ni dag pa dang ma dag pa dang dag ma dag go/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku shin tu mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ngo bo de dag thams cad 'dus ma byas so zhes rnam par gzhag
[\[316b.6\]]go/_/paN+Di ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa las 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u sum cu lnga pa'o//_//rnam pa de ltar chos mtha' med/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas pa'i chos/_/phung po du mar phye nas ni/_/sangs
[\[316b.7\]]rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa de/_/blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul lo/_/brtson pas sngon gyi slob dpon gyis/_/mi rnams la ni brtse mdzad nas/_/rgya mtsho che las chu thigs ltar/_/rgya che'i chos ni de rnams las/_/de chos bdud rtsis gang ba yi/_/bstan bcos rgya mtsho chen po ston/_/chu yi
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]thigs pas stong cha ltar/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas rnams kyi/_/chos rnams rnam par nges pa dag_/de las bdag gis yang bsdus so/_/des na phyogs 'di'i bde legs kyi/_/thar pa sngon 'byung rgyu gcig pu/_/bstan pa rin chen chos rnams kyi/_/rab tu dbyer bcas rgyas zhes bya/_/'dus
[\[317a.2\]]byas 'dus ma byas chos rnams/_/gcig tu bsdus las bdag gi gang /_/bsod nams des ni 'gro ba rnams/_/'dus byas 'dus ma byas mkhyen gyur/_/'di ltar yang /_thub pa'i ngag ni nges par rtogs par dka' ba nyid de'i gsal bar byed pa rnams/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyis 'grel mdzad rgyas pa bstan
[\[317a.3\]]bcos chen po thams cad kyang /_/rtogs par dka' ba de las ji lta bur yang tshig gam ngag dag drangs pa 'di/_/yid gzhungs ngan pa rang yid khrel yod ring du spangs nas gzhung ni 'grel mdzad ces/_/rab tu byed pa tha shal 'di las gang dag rang ngam gzhan don phun tshogs 'byung /_/blo ngan 'dis ni 'di ru khyad
[\[317a.4\]]'phags byas gang ngal ba 'ba' zhig skye bar zad/_/de la sogs pa'i rab bslang smra ba'i rdo rje drag pos rang gi mgo la bsnun pa yis/_/rma ni gsal bar rang gis bkod de mi srun don du bdag gis gzhung ma byas/_/'on kyang rgas shing rnyings pa brtan pos non pas bstan bcos mang po rnams/_/rgyun du lta bar
[\[317a.5\]]mi nus pas yin nga rgyal las ma yin/_/sde pa sna tshogs dang ni rgyal sras tshul lugs rjes 'brangs nas/_/bslab bya'i yul rnams thams cad 'bad pas gcig tu yongs su bzlums/_/mnyam med rgyal ba'i chos 'di rang nyid kho na yis/_/gzhung 'di gcig pus yul rnams thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/
[\[317a.6\]]bdag gis brtsams kyang skye bo gzhan don ma yin 'di dag las/_/legs gsungs bdud rtsi ro yang shin tu chung ba 'dir nges mchis/_/des kyang skye bo dam pa'i yid rab tshim zhing mnyes par 'gyur/_/de nyid kyis na bdag gi ngal ba nges par dpal yod lags/_/'on kyang sa stengs
[\[317a.7\]]dag na skye bo dam pa 'thor bur gnas/_/mi srid dri ma glang pos spags pa sa stengs khyab par gnas/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba/_shAkya'i dge slong paN+Di ta gnas brtan chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//_
